Require Import List Streams Nat Bool.
Import ListNotations.
Require Import Logic.FunctionalExtensionality.

Require Import Coq.Logic.FinFun Coq.Logic.Eqdep.

From CasperCBC
  Require Import
    StreamExtras ListExtras Preamble
    VLSM.Common
    .
This module provides Coq definitions for composite VLSMs and their projections to components. 
Section VLSM_composition.

VLSM composition

Let us fix a type for messages, and an index type for the VLSM components such that equality on index is decidable. 
  Context {message : Type}
          {index : Type}
          {IndEqDec : EqDecision index}
          (IM : index -> VLSM message)
          .

  Section composite_type.

The type of a composite VLSM

Let IM be a family of VLSMs indexed by index. Note that all VLSMs share the same type of messages.
A composite_state is an indexed family of states, yielding for each index n a state of type IT n, the VLSM_type corresponding to machine n.
Note that the composite_state type is the dependent product type of the family of state types corresponding to each index. 
    Definition _composite_state : Type :=
      forall n : index, vstate (IM n).
A composite_label is a pair between an index N and a label of IT n.
Note that the composite_label type is the dependent sum of the family of types [@label _ (IT n) | n <- index]. 
    Definition _composite_label
      : Type
      := sigT (fun n => vlabel (IM n)).

    Definition composite_type : VLSM_type message :=
      {| state := _composite_state
       ; label := _composite_label
      |}.

    Definition composite_state := @state message composite_type.
    Definition composite_label := @label message composite_type.
A very useful operation on composite_states is updating the state corresponding to a component: 
    Definition state_update
               (s : composite_state)
               (i : index)
               (si : vstate (IM i))
               (j : index)
      : vstate (IM j)
      :=
      match decide (j = i) with
      | left e => eq_rect_r (fun i => vstate (IM i)) si e
      | _ => s j
      end.
The next few results describe several properties of the state_update operation. 
    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
s:composite_state
i:index
si:vstate (IM i)
j:index
Hneq:j <> i
state_update s i si j = s j

    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
s:composite_state
i:index
si:vstate (IM i)
j:index
Hneq:j <> i
state_update s i si j = s j

      
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
s:composite_state
i:index
si:vstate (IM i)
j:index
Hneq:j <> i
match decide (j = i) with
| left e =>
    eq_rect_r (fun i : index => vstate (IM i)) si e
| right _ => s j
end = s j
 
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
s:composite_state
i:index
si:vstate (IM i)
j:index
Hneq, n:j <> i
s j = s j
 reflexivity.
    Qed.

message, index:Type

IM:index -> VLSM message
s:composite_state
i:index
si:vstate (IM i)
match IndEqDec i i with
| left e =>
    eq_rect_r (fun i : index => vstate (IM i)) si e
| right _ => s i
end = si

      
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
s:composite_state
i:index
si:vstate (IM i)
eq_rect_r (fun i : index => vstate (IM i)) si eq_refl =
si
 reflexivity.
    Qed.

s k = s k

      reflexivity.
    Qed.
  End composite_type.

  Section composite_sig.

The signature of a composite VLSM

Assume an non-empty index type and let IT be an indexed family of VLSM_types, and for each index i, let IS i be a VLSM_signature of type IT i. 
    Context `{i0: Inhabited index}.
A composite_state has the initial_state_property if all of its component states have the initial_state_property in the corresponding component signature. 
    Definition composite_initial_state_prop
               (s : composite_state)
      : Prop
      :=
        forall n : index, vinitial_state_prop (IM n) (s n).

    Definition composite_initial_state
      := sig composite_initial_state_prop.

    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
composite_initial_state

    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
composite_initial_state

      
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
composite_initial_state_prop
  (fun n : index => proj1_sig (vs0 (IM n)))

      
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
i:index
vinitial_state_prop (IM i) (proj1_sig (vs0 (IM i)))
 
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
i:index
vinitial_state_prop (IM i) (proj1_sig s0)
 
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
i:index
s:state
Hs:initial_state_prop s
vinitial_state_prop (IM i)
  (proj1_sig
     (exist (fun s : state => initial_state_prop s) s
        Hs))
 assumption.
    Defined.
A message has the initial_message_property in the composite_signature iff it has the initial_message_property in any of the component signatures. 
    Definition composite_initial_message_prop (m : message) : Prop
      :=
        exists (n : index) (mi : vinitial_message (IM n)), proj1_sig mi = m.

    (* An explicit argument for the initial state witness is no longer required: *)
    Definition composite_m0 : message := vm0 (IM inhabitant).

    Definition composite_l0 : composite_label
      := existT _ inhabitant (vl0 (IM inhabitant)) .

    Definition composite_sig
      : VLSM_sign composite_type
      :=
        {|   initial_state_prop := composite_initial_state_prop
           ; s0 := composite_s0
           ; initial_message_prop := composite_initial_message_prop
           ; m0 := composite_m0
           ; l0 := composite_l0
        |}.
We can always "lift" state sj from component j to a composite state by updating an initial composite state, say s0, to sj on component j. 
    Definition lift_to_composite_state
      (j : index)
      (sj : vstate (IM j))
      (s0X := proj1_sig composite_s0)
      : composite_state
      := state_update s0X j sj.

    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
j:index
item:vtransition_item (IM j)
s0X:=proj1_sig composite_s0:composite_state
transition_item

    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
j:index
item:vtransition_item (IM j)
s0X:=proj1_sig composite_s0:composite_state
transition_item

      
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
j:index
l:label
input:option message
destination:state
output:option message
s0X:=proj1_sig composite_s0:composite_state
transition_item

j:index
l:label
input:option message
destination:state
output:option message
s0X:=proj1_sig composite_s0:composite_state
label

s0X:=proj1_sig composite_s0:composite_state
option message
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index

i0:Inhabited index

message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
j:index
l:label
input:option message
destination:state
output:option message
s0X:=proj1_sig composite_s0:composite_state
state
 exact (lift_to_composite_state j destination).
      
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
j:index
l:label
input:option message
destination:state
output:option message
s0X:=proj1_sig composite_s0:composite_state
option message
 exact output.
    Defined.

    Definition lift_to_composite_trace
      (j : index)
      (trj : vTrace (IM j))
      : @Trace _ composite_type
      :=
      match trj with
      | Finite s l => Finite (lift_to_composite_state j s) (List.map (lift_to_composite_transition_item j) l)
      | Infinite s l => Infinite (lift_to_composite_state j s) (Streams.map (lift_to_composite_transition_item j) l)
      end.

  End composite_sig.

  Section composite_vlsm.

Constrained VLSM composition

Assume an non-empty index type, let 
IT
be an indexed family of VLSM_types, and for each index i, let 
IS i
be a VLSM_signature of type IT i and IM i be a VLSM of signature IS i. 
    Context `{i0 : Inhabited index}.
The transition function for the composite_vlsm is defined as follows takes a transition in the VLSM corresponding to the given composite_label and returnes the produced message together with the state updated on that component: 
    Definition composite_transition
      (l : composite_label)
      (som : composite_state * option message)
      : composite_state * option message
      :=
      let (s, om) := som in
      let (i, li) := l in
      let (si', om') := vtransition (IM i) li (s i, om) in
      (state_update s i si',  om').
Given a composite_label (i, li) and a composite_state-message pair (s, om), free_composite_validity is defined as validity in the ith component IM i. 
    Definition free_composite_valid
      (l : composite_label)
      (som : composite_state * option message)
      : Prop
      :=
      let (s, om) := som in
      let (i, li) := l in
      vvalid (IM i) li (s i, om).
A constraint for a composite VLSM is a validity condition defined directly on composite_labels and composite_states, thus being able to impose a global condition.
constrained_composite_validity interposes such a constraint on top of the free_composite_validity. 
    Definition constrained_composite_valid
      (constraint : composite_label -> composite_state * option message -> Prop)
      (l : composite_label)
      (som : composite_state * option message)
      :=
      free_composite_valid l som /\ constraint l som.

    Definition composite_vlsm_machine
      (constraint : composite_label -> composite_state * option message -> Prop)
      : VLSM_class composite_sig
      :=
      {|  transition := composite_transition
       ;  valid := constrained_composite_valid constraint
      |}.

    Definition composite_vlsm
      (constraint : composite_label -> composite_state * option message -> Prop)
      : VLSM message
      := mk_vlsm (composite_vlsm_machine constraint).

    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
constraint:composite_label ->
composite_state * option message -> Prop
l:composite_label
s, s':composite_state
om, om':option message
Ht:protocol_transition (composite_vlsm constraint) l
  (s, om) (s', om')
i:index
Hi:i <> projT1 l
s' i = s i

    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
constraint:composite_label ->
composite_state * option message -> Prop
l:composite_label
s, s':composite_state
om, om':option message
Ht:protocol_transition (composite_vlsm constraint) l
  (s, om) (s', om')
i:index
Hi:i <> projT1 l
s' i = s i

Ht:transition l (s, om) = (s', om')

s' i = s i

il:index

   vtransition (IM il) l (s il, om) in
 (state_update s il si', om')) = 
(s', om')
i:index
Hi:i <>
projT1
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) il l)
s' i = s i

   vtransition (IM il) l (s il, om) in

s' i = s i

      
message, index:Type

composite_state * option message -> Prop

s, s':composite_state
om, om':option message
si':state
omi':option message
Ht':vtransition (IM il) l (s il, om) = (si', omi')
Ht:(state_update s il si', omi') = (s', om')
i:index
Hi:i <> il
H0:state_update s il si' = s'
H1:omi' = om'
state_update s il si' i = s i
 
message, index:Type

Ht':vtransition (IM il) l (s il, om) = (si', om')

Hi:i <> il
H0:state_update s il si' = s'
state_update s il si' i = s i

i:index
Hi:i <> il
H0:state_update s il si' = s'
i <> il
 assumption.
    Qed.

    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
constraint:composite_label ->
composite_state * option message -> Prop
l:composite_label
s, s':composite_state
om, om':option message
Ht:protocol_transition (composite_vlsm constraint) l
  (s, om) (s', om')
il:=projT1 l:index
s' il =
fst (vtransition (IM il) (projT2 l) (s il, om))

composite_state * option message -> Prop
l:composite_label
s, s':composite_state
om, om':option message
Ht:protocol_transition (composite_vlsm constraint) l
  (s, om) (s', om')
il:=projT1 l:index
s' il =
fst (vtransition (IM il) (projT2 l) (s il, om))

Ht:transition l (s, om) = (s', om')
il:=projT1 l:index

fst (vtransition (IM il) (projT2 l) (s il, om))

om, om':option message
Ht:(let (i, li) := l in
 let (si', om') :=
   vtransition (IM i) li (s i, om) in
 (state_update s i si', om')) = 
(s', om')
il:=projT1 l:index
s' il =
fst (vtransition (IM il) (projT2 l) (s il, om))

 let (si', om') :=
   vtransition (IM i) li (s i, om) in
 (state_update s i si', om')) = 
(s', om')
il:=projT1 l:index
s' (projT1 l) =
fst
  (vtransition (IM (projT1 l)) (projT2 l)
     (s (projT1 l), om))

message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
constraint:composite_label ->
composite_state * option message -> Prop
il:index
l:vlabel (IM il)
s, s':composite_state
om, om':option message
Ht:(let (si', om') :=
   vtransition (IM il) l (s il, om) in
 (state_update s il si', om')) = 
(s', om')
s'
  (projT1
     (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) il l)) =
fst
  (vtransition
     (IM
        (projT1
           (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) il
              l)))
     (projT2
        (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) il l))
     (s
        (projT1
           (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) il
              l)), om))

composite_state * option message -> Prop
il:index
l:vlabel (IM il)
s, s':composite_state
om, om':option message
Ht:(let (si', om') :=
   vtransition (IM il) l (s il, om) in
 (state_update s il si', om')) = 
(s', om')
s' il = fst (vtransition (IM il) l (s il, om))

      
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
constraint:composite_label ->
composite_state * option message -> Prop
il:index
l:vlabel (IM il)
s, s':composite_state
om, om':option message
si':state
omi':option message
Ht':vtransition (IM il) l (s il, om) = (si', omi')
Ht:(state_update s il si', omi') = (s', om')
s' il = fst (si', omi')

      
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
constraint:composite_label ->
composite_state * option message -> Prop
il:index
l:vlabel (IM il)
s, s':composite_state
om, om':option message
si':state
omi':option message
Ht':vtransition (IM il) l (s il, om) = (si', omi')
Ht:(state_update s il si', omi') = (s', om')
H0:state_update s il si' = s'
H1:omi' = om'
state_update s il si' il = fst (si', om')
 apply state_update_eq.
    Qed.

    Section constraint_subsumption.

Constraint subssumption

A constraint1 is subssumed by constraint2 if constraint1> is stronger than <<constraint2 for any input. 
    Definition constraint_subsumption
        (constraint1 constraint2 : composite_label -> composite_state * option message -> Prop)
        :=
        forall (l : composite_label) (som : composite_state * option message),
          constraint1 l som -> constraint2 l som.

    Context
      (constraint1 constraint2 : composite_label -> composite_state * option message -> Prop)
      (Hsubsumption : constraint_subsumption constraint1 constraint2)
      (X1 := composite_vlsm constraint1)
      (X2 := composite_vlsm constraint2)
      .
Let X1, X2 be two compositions of the same family of VLSMs but with constraints constraint1 and constraint2>, respectively. Further assume that <<constraint1 is subssumed by constraint2.
We will show that X1 is trace-included into X2 by applying Lemma basic_VLSM_inclusion 
(* begin hide *)
    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
constraint1, constraint2:composite_label ->
composite_state * option message -> Prop
Hsubsumption:constraint_subsumption constraint1
  constraint2
X1:=composite_vlsm constraint1:VLSM message
X2:=composite_vlsm constraint2:VLSM message
l:label
s:state
om:option message
Hv:protocol_valid X1 l (s, om)
vvalid X2 l (s, om)

  constraint2
X1:=composite_vlsm constraint1:VLSM message
X2:=composite_vlsm constraint2:VLSM message

s:state
om:option message
Hv:protocol_valid X1 l (s, om)
vvalid X2 l (s, om)

vvalid X2 l (s, om)

IHHps2:protocol_prop X2 (_s, om0)

message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
constraint1, constraint2:composite_label ->
composite_state * option message -> Prop
Hsubsumption:constraint_subsumption constraint1
  constraint2
X1:=composite_vlsm constraint1:VLSM message
X2:=composite_vlsm constraint2:VLSM message
s:state
om:option message
l:label
s0:state
_om:option message
Hps1:protocol_prop X1 (s0, _om)
_s:state
om0:option message
Hps2:protocol_prop X1 (_s, om0)
Hv:valid l (s0, om0)
IHHps1:protocol_prop X2 (s0, _om)
IHHps2:protocol_prop X2 (_s, om0)
protocol_valid X1 l (s0, om0)

        apply protocol_generated_valid with _om _s; assumption.
    Qed.

om0:option message

s:state

_s0:state
Hom0:protocol_prop X2 (_s0, om0)
Hv1:valid l (s0, om0)
Ht:transition l (s0, om0) = (s, Some m)
Hv2:vvalid X2 l (s0, om0)
exists (l : label) (s : state),
  protocol_transition X2 l (s0, om0) (s, Some m)

option_protocol_message_prop X2 om0

constraint1, constraint2:composite_label ->
composite_state * option message -> Prop
Hsubsumption:constraint_subsumption constraint1
  constraint2
X1:=composite_vlsm constraint1:VLSM message
X2:=composite_vlsm constraint2:VLSM message
m:message
s0:state
om0:option message
l:label
s:state
_om0:option message
Hs0:protocol_prop X2 (s0, _om0)
_s0:state
Hom0:protocol_prop X2 (_s0, om0)
Hv1:valid l (s0, om0)
Ht:transition l (s0, om0) = (s, Some m)
Hv2:free_composite_valid l (s0, om0)
Hc2:constraint2 l (s0, om0)
protocol_state_prop X2 s0
 
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
constraint1, constraint2:composite_label ->
composite_state * option message -> Prop
Hsubsumption:constraint_subsumption constraint1
  constraint2
X1:=composite_vlsm constraint1:VLSM message
X2:=composite_vlsm constraint2:VLSM message
m:message
s0:state
om0:option message
l:label
s:state
_om0:option message
Hs0:protocol_prop X2 (s0, _om0)
_s0:state
Hom0:protocol_prop X2 (_s0, om0)
Hv1:valid l (s0, om0)
Ht:transition l (s0, om0) = (s, Some m)
Hv2:free_composite_valid l (s0, om0)
Hc2:constraint2 l (s0, om0)
protocol_prop X2 (s0, _om0)
 assumption.

  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X1) l
  (s, om)

  (s, om)

  (s, om)

message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
constraint1, constraint2:composite_label ->
composite_state * option message -> Prop
Hsubsumption:constraint_subsumption constraint1
  constraint2
X1:=composite_vlsm constraint1:VLSM message
X2:=composite_vlsm constraint2:VLSM message
s:state
om:option message
im:initial_message
s0:=proj1_sig Common.s0:state
om0:=Some (proj1_sig im):option message

  (s0, om0)
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
constraint1, constraint2:composite_label ->
composite_state * option message -> Prop
Hsubsumption:constraint_subsumption constraint1
  constraint2
X1:=composite_vlsm constraint1:VLSM message
X2:=composite_vlsm constraint2:VLSM message
s:state
om:option message
l:label
s0:state
_om:option message
Hps1:protocol_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X1)
  (s0, _om)
_s:state
om0:option message
Hps2:protocol_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X1)
  (_s, om0)
Hv:valid l (s0, om0)
IHHps1:protocol_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X2)
  (s0, _om)
IHHps2:protocol_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X2)
  (_s, om0)
protocol_prop (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X2)
  (transition l (s0, om0))

  constraint2
X1:=composite_vlsm constraint1:VLSM message
X2:=composite_vlsm constraint2:VLSM message
s:state
om:option message
is:initial_state
s0:=proj1_sig is:state
protocol_prop (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X2)
  (s0, None)
 apply (protocol_initial_state (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X2) is).

message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index

composite_state * option message -> Prop
Hsubsumption:constraint_subsumption constraint1
  constraint2
X1:=composite_vlsm constraint1:VLSM message
X2:=composite_vlsm constraint2:VLSM message
m:message
Hm:byzantine_message_prop X1 m
byzantine_message_prop X2 m

i0:Inhabited index

  constraint2

message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
constraint1, constraint2:composite_label ->
composite_state * option message -> Prop
Hsubsumption:constraint_subsumption constraint1
  constraint2
X1:=composite_vlsm constraint1:VLSM message
X2:=composite_vlsm constraint2:VLSM message
m:message
s0:state
om0:option message
l:label

  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X1) l
  (s0, om0)
Ht:transition l (s0, om0) = (s, Some m)
byzantine_message_prop X2 m

      
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
constraint1, constraint2:composite_label ->
composite_state * option message -> Prop
Hsubsumption:constraint_subsumption constraint1
  constraint2
X1:=composite_vlsm constraint1:VLSM message
X2:=composite_vlsm constraint2:VLSM message
m:message
s0:state
om0:option message
l:label
s:state
Hv1:protocol_valid
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X1) l
  (s0, om0)
Ht:transition l (s0, om0) = (s, Some m)
Hv2:vvalid (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X2) l
  (s0, om0)
byzantine_message_prop X2 m

      
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
constraint1, constraint2:composite_label ->
composite_state * option message -> Prop
Hsubsumption:constraint_subsumption constraint1
  constraint2
X1:=composite_vlsm constraint1:VLSM message
X2:=composite_vlsm constraint2:VLSM message
m:message
s0:state
om0:option message
l:label
s:state
_om0:option message
Hs0:protocol_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X1)
  (s0, _om0)
_s0:state
Hom0:protocol_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X1)
  (_s0, om0)
Hv1:valid l (s0, om0)
Ht:transition l (s0, om0) = (s, Some m)
Hv2:vvalid (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X2) l
  (s0, om0)
byzantine_message_prop X2 m

  (_s0, om0)

  (s0, om0)
exists (l : label) (s : state),
  protocol_transition
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X2) l (s0, om0)
    (s, Some m)

    Qed.

(* end hide *)
Then X1 is trace-included into X2. 
    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
constraint1, constraint2:composite_label ->
composite_state * option message -> Prop
Hsubsumption:constraint_subsumption constraint1
  constraint2
X1:=composite_vlsm constraint1:VLSM message
X2:=composite_vlsm constraint2:VLSM message
VLSM_incl X1 X2

  constraint2

VLSM_incl X1 X2

  constraint2

s:state
om:option message

option_protocol_message_prop (mk_vlsm (machine X2)) om

    Qed.

     (machine (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X2)))
  l (s, om)

message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
constraint1, constraint2:composite_label ->
composite_state * option message -> Prop
Hsubsumption:constraint_subsumption constraint1
  constraint2
X1:=composite_vlsm constraint1:VLSM message
X2:=composite_vlsm constraint2:VLSM message
l:label
s:state
om:option message
H:protocol_valid
  (mk_vlsm
     (machine
        (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X1))) l
  (s, om)
protocol_valid (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X1)
  l (s, om)

        assumption.
    Qed.

    End constraint_subsumption.

Free VLSM composition

The free_constraint is defined to be True for all inputs. Thus, the free_composite_vlsm is the composite_vlsm using the free_constraint. 
    Definition free_constraint
      (l : composite_label)
      (som : composite_state * option message)
      : Prop
      := True.

    Definition free_composite_vlsm : VLSM message
      := composite_vlsm free_constraint.
Next two lemmas are corrolaries of the above, instantiates on the free composition whose constraint (True) subsumes any constraint. 
    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
constraint:composite_label ->
composite_state * option message -> Prop
VLSM_incl (composite_vlsm constraint)
  free_composite_vlsm

    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
constraint:composite_label ->
composite_state * option message -> Prop
VLSM_incl (composite_vlsm constraint)
  free_composite_vlsm

      
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
constraint:composite_label ->
composite_state * option message -> Prop
constraint_subsumption constraint free_constraint

      
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
constraint:composite_label ->
composite_state * option message -> Prop
l:composite_label
som:(composite_state * option message)%type
H:constraint l som
free_constraint l som
 exact I.
    Qed.

message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
constraint:composite_label ->
composite_state * option message -> Prop
s:state
om:option message
Hsom:protocol_prop (composite_vlsm constraint)
  (s, om)
l:composite_label
som:(composite_state * option message)%type
H:constraint l som
free_constraint l som
 exact I.
    Qed.
A component protocol_state's lift_to_composite_state is a protocol_state for the free_composite_vlsm. 
    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
j:index
sj:vstate (IM j)
om:option message
Hp:protocol_prop (IM j) (sj, om)
s:=lift_to_composite_state j sj:composite_state
protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm (s, om)

sj:vstate (IM j)
om:option message
Hp:protocol_prop (IM j) (sj, om)
s:=lift_to_composite_state j sj:composite_state
protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm (s, om)

      
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
j:index
sj:vstate (IM j)
om:option message
sjom:(vstate (IM j) * option message)%type
Heqsjom:sjom = (sj, om)
Hp:protocol_prop (IM j) sjom
s:=lift_to_composite_state j sj:composite_state
protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm (s, om)

      
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
j:index
sj:vstate (IM j)
sjom:(vstate (IM j) * option message)%type
Hp:protocol_prop (IM j) sjom
s:=lift_to_composite_state j sj:composite_state
forall om : option message,
sjom = (sj, om) ->
protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm (s, om)
 
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
j:index

Hp:protocol_prop (IM j) sjom
forall sj : vstate (IM j),
let s := lift_to_composite_state j sj in
forall om : option message,
sjom = (sj, om) ->
protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm (s, om)

message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
j:index
l:label
s:state
_om:option message
Hp1:protocol_prop (IM j) (s, _om)
_s:state
om:option message
Hp2:protocol_prop (IM j) (_s, om)
Hv:valid l (s, om)
IHHp1:forall sj : vstate (IM j),
let s0 := lift_to_composite_state j sj in
forall om : option message,
(s, _om) = (sj, om) ->
protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm (s0, om)
IHHp2:forall sj : vstate (IM j),
let s := lift_to_composite_state j sj in
forall om0 : option message,
(_s, om) = (sj, om0) ->
protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm (s, om0)
sj:vstate (IM j)
om0:option message
H0:transition l (s, om) = (sj, om0)
protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (lift_to_composite_state j sj, om0)

message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
j:index
l:label
s:state
_om:option message
Hp1:protocol_prop (IM j) (s, _om)
_s:state
om:option message
Hp2:protocol_prop (IM j) (_s, om)
Hv:valid l (s, om)
IHHp1:forall sj : vstate (IM j),
let s0 := lift_to_composite_state j sj in
forall om : option message,
(s, _om) = (sj, om) ->
protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm (s0, om)
IHHp2:forall sj : vstate (IM j),
let s := lift_to_composite_state j sj in
forall om0 : option message,
(_s, om) = (sj, om0) ->
protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm (s, om0)
sj:vstate (IM j)
om0:option message
H0:transition l (s, om) = (sj, om0)
protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (lift_to_composite_state j sj, om0)
 
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
j:index
l:label
s:state
_om:option message
Hp1:protocol_prop (IM j) (s, _om)
_s:state
om:option message
Hp2:protocol_prop (IM j) (_s, om)
Hv:valid l (s, om)
IHHp1:protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (lift_to_composite_state j s, _om)
IHHp2:forall sj : vstate (IM j),
let s := lift_to_composite_state j sj in
forall om0 : option message,
(_s, om) = (sj, om0) ->
protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm (s, om0)
sj:vstate (IM j)
om0:option message
H0:transition l (s, om) = (sj, om0)
protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (lift_to_composite_state j sj, om0)

_s:state

Hp2:protocol_prop (IM j) (_s, om)

IHHp1:protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (lift_to_composite_state j s, _om)
IHHp2:protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (lift_to_composite_state j _s, om)

  (lift_to_composite_state j sj, om0)

        
message, index:Type

  (lift_to_composite_state j _s, om)

  (vtransition free_composite_vlsm
     (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
     (lift_to_composite_state j s, om))
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
j:index
l:label
s:state
_om:option message
Hp1:protocol_prop (IM j) (s, _om)
_s:state
om:option message
Hp2:protocol_prop (IM j) (_s, om)
Hv:valid l (s, om)
IHHp1:protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (lift_to_composite_state j s, _om)
IHHp2:protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (lift_to_composite_state j _s, om)
sj:vstate (IM j)
om0:option message
H0:transition l (s, om) = (sj, om0)
vtransition free_composite_vlsm
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
  (lift_to_composite_state j s, om) =
(lift_to_composite_state j sj, om0)

  (lift_to_composite_state j _s, om)

om0:option message
H0:transition l (s, om) = (sj, om0)
protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (vtransition free_composite_vlsm
     (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
     (lift_to_composite_state j s, om))
 
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
j:index
l:label
s:state
_om:option message
Hp1:protocol_prop (IM j) (s, _om)
_s:state
om:option message
Hp2:protocol_prop (IM j) (_s, om)
Hv:valid l (s, om)
IHHp1:protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (lift_to_composite_state j s, _om)
IHHp2:protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (lift_to_composite_state j _s, om)
sj:vstate (IM j)
om0:option message
H0:transition l (s, om) = (sj, om0)
valid (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
  (lift_to_composite_state j s, om)

          
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
j:index
l:label
s:state
_om:option message
Hp1:protocol_prop (IM j) (s, _om)
_s:state
om:option message
Hp2:protocol_prop (IM j) (_s, om)
Hv:valid l (s, om)
IHHp1:protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (lift_to_composite_state j s, _om)
IHHp2:protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (lift_to_composite_state j _s, om)
sj:vstate (IM j)
om0:option message
H0:transition l (s, om) = (sj, om0)
free_composite_valid
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
  (lift_to_composite_state j s, om)

 om')) = (lift_to_composite_state j sj, om0)

message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message

l:label
om, om':option message

Hom:option_protocol_message_prop free_composite_vlsm
  om
Hv:let (i, li) := l in vvalid (IM i) li (s i, om)
Ht:(let (i, li) := l in
 let (si', om') :=
   vtransition (IM i) li (s i, om) in
 (state_update s i si', om')) = 
(s', om')

  (state_update s i si)

  (state_update s' i si)

        
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index

s':state
j:index
lj:vlabel (IM j)
om, om':option message
s:state
Hps:protocol_state_prop free_composite_vlsm s
Hom:option_protocol_message_prop free_composite_vlsm
  om
Hv:vvalid (IM j) lj (s j, om)
Ht:(let (si', om') :=
   vtransition (IM j) lj (s j, om) in
 (state_update s j si', om')) = 
(s', om')

  (state_update s i si)

  (state_update s' i si)

        
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
i:index
si:vstate (IM i)
Hsi:vinitial_state_prop (IM i) si
s':state
j:index
lj:vlabel (IM j)
om, om':option message
s:state
Hps:protocol_state_prop free_composite_vlsm s
Hom:option_protocol_message_prop free_composite_vlsm
  om
Hv:vvalid (IM j) lj (s j, om)
sj':state
omj':option message
Htj:vtransition (IM j) lj (s j, om) = (sj', omj')
Ht:(state_update s j sj', omj') = (s', om')
Hs:protocol_state_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (state_update s i si)
protocol_state_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (state_update s' i si)

        
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
i:index
si:vstate (IM i)
Hsi:vinitial_state_prop (IM i) si
s':state
j:index
lj:vlabel (IM j)
om, om':option message
s:state
Hps:protocol_state_prop free_composite_vlsm s
Hom:option_protocol_message_prop free_composite_vlsm
  om
Hv:vvalid (IM j) lj (s j, om)
sj':state
omj':option message
Htj:vtransition (IM j) lj (s j, om) = (sj', omj')
Ht:(state_update s j sj', omj') = (s', om')
Hs:protocol_state_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (state_update s i si)
H0:state_update s j sj' = s'
H1:omj' = om'
protocol_state_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (state_update (state_update s j sj') i si)
 
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
i:index
si:vstate (IM i)
Hsi:vinitial_state_prop (IM i) si
j:index
lj:vlabel (IM j)
om:option message
s:state
Hps:protocol_state_prop free_composite_vlsm s
Hom:option_protocol_message_prop free_composite_vlsm
  om
Hv:vvalid (IM j) lj (s j, om)
sj':state
omj':option message
Htj:vtransition (IM j) lj (s j, om) = (sj', omj')
Ht:(state_update s j sj', omj') =
(state_update s j sj', omj')
Hs:protocol_state_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (state_update s i si)
protocol_state_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (state_update (state_update s j sj') i si)

j:index
lj:vlabel (IM j)
om:option message
s:state

Hom:option_protocol_message_prop free_composite_vlsm
  om
Hv:vvalid (IM j) lj (s j, om)
sj':state
omj':option message
Htj:vtransition (IM j) lj (s j, om) = (sj', omj')
Hs:protocol_state_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (state_update s i si)
protocol_state_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (state_update (state_update s j sj') i si)

message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
i:index
si:vstate (IM i)
Hsi:vinitial_state_prop (IM i) si
j:index
lj:vlabel (IM j)
om:option message
s:state
Hps:protocol_state_prop free_composite_vlsm s
_s:state
Hom:protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm (_s, om)
Hv:vvalid (IM j) lj (s j, om)
sj':state
omj':option message
Htj:vtransition (IM j) lj (s j, om) = (sj', omj')
_om:option message
Hs:protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (state_update s i si, _om)
n:i <> j
Hgen:valid
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j lj)
  (state_update s i si, om) ->
protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (transition
     (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j
        lj) (state_update s i si, om))
protocol_state_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (state_update (state_update s i si) j sj')

message, index:Type

lj:vlabel (IM j)

sj':state
omj':option message
Htj:vtransition (IM j) lj (s j, om) = (sj', omj')
_om:option message
Hs:protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (state_update s i si, _om)
n:i <> j
Hgen:valid
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j lj)
  (state_update s i si, om) ->
protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (transition
     (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j
        lj) (state_update s i si, om))
n':j <> i
valid (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j lj)
  (state_update s i si, om)
 
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
i:index
si:vstate (IM i)
Hsi:vinitial_state_prop (IM i) si
j:index
lj:vlabel (IM j)
om:option message
s:state
Hps:protocol_state_prop free_composite_vlsm s
_s:state
Hom:protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm (_s, om)
Hv:vvalid (IM j) lj (s j, om)
sj':state
omj':option message
Htj:vtransition (IM j) lj (s j, om) = (sj', omj')
_om:option message
Hs:protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (state_update s i si, _om)
n:i <> j
Hgen:valid
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j lj)
  (state_update s i si, om) ->
protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (transition
     (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j
        lj) (state_update s i si, om))
n':j <> i
free_composite_valid
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j lj)
  (state_update s i si, om)
 
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
i:index
si:vstate (IM i)
Hsi:vinitial_state_prop (IM i) si
j:index
lj:vlabel (IM j)
om:option message
s:state
Hps:protocol_state_prop free_composite_vlsm s
_s:state
Hom:protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm (_s, om)
Hv:vvalid (IM j) lj (s j, om)
sj':state
omj':option message
Htj:vtransition (IM j) lj (s j, om) = (sj', omj')
_om:option message
Hs:protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (state_update s i si, _om)
n:i <> j
Hgen:valid
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j lj)
  (state_update s i si, om) ->
protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (transition
     (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j
        lj) (state_update s i si, om))
n':j <> i
vvalid (IM j) lj (state_update s i si j, om)
 rewrite state_update_neq; assumption. 
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
i:index
si:vstate (IM i)
Hsi:vinitial_state_prop (IM i) si
j:index
lj:vlabel (IM j)
om:option message
s:state
Hps:protocol_state_prop free_composite_vlsm s
_s:state
Hom:protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm (_s, om)
Hv:vvalid (IM j) lj (s j, om)
sj':state
omj':option message
Htj:vtransition (IM j) lj (s j, om) = (sj', omj')
_om:option message
Hs:protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (state_update s i si, _om)
n:i <> j
n':j <> i
Hgen:protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (transition
     (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j
        lj) (state_update s i si, om))
protocol_state_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (state_update (state_update s i si) j sj')

          
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
i:index
si:vstate (IM i)
Hsi:vinitial_state_prop (IM i) si
j:index
lj:vlabel (IM j)
om:option message
s:state
Hps:protocol_state_prop free_composite_vlsm s
_s:state
Hom:protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm (_s, om)
Hv:vvalid (IM j) lj (s j, om)
sj':state
omj':option message
Htj:vtransition (IM j) lj (s j, om) = (sj', omj')
_om:option message
Hs:protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (state_update s i si, _om)
n:i <> j
n':j <> i
Hgen:protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (let (si', om') :=
     vtransition (IM j) lj
       (state_update s i si j, om) in
   (state_update (state_update s i si) j si',
   om'))
protocol_state_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (state_update (state_update s i si) j sj')

          
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
i:index
si:vstate (IM i)
Hsi:vinitial_state_prop (IM i) si
j:index
lj:vlabel (IM j)
om:option message
s:state
Hps:protocol_state_prop free_composite_vlsm s
_s:state
Hom:protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm (_s, om)
Hv:vvalid (IM j) lj (s j, om)
sj':state
omj':option message
Htj:vtransition (IM j) lj (s j, om) = (sj', omj')
_om:option message
Hs:protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (state_update s i si, _om)
n:i <> j
n':j <> i
Hgen:protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (let (si', om') :=
     vtransition (IM j) lj (s j, om) in
   (state_update (state_update s i si) j si',
   om'))
protocol_state_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (state_update (state_update s i si) j sj')
 
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
i:index
si:vstate (IM i)
Hsi:vinitial_state_prop (IM i) si
j:index
lj:vlabel (IM j)
om:option message
s:_composite_state
Hps:protocol_state_prop free_composite_vlsm s
_s:_composite_state
Hom:protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm (_s, om)
Hv:vvalid (IM j) lj (s j, om)
sj':state
omj':option message
Htj:vtransition (IM j) lj (s j, om) = (sj', omj')
_om:option message
Hs:protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (state_update s i si, _om)
n:i <> j
n':j <> i
Hgen:protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (let (si', om') :=
     vtransition (IM j) lj (s j, om) in
   (state_update (state_update s i si) j si',
   om'))
protocol_state_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (state_update (state_update s i si) j sj')

          
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
i:index
si:vstate (IM i)
Hsi:vinitial_state_prop (IM i) si
j:index
lj:vlabel (IM j)
om:option message
s:_composite_state
Hps:protocol_state_prop free_composite_vlsm s
_s:_composite_state
Hom:protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm (_s, om)
Hv:vvalid (IM j) lj (s j, om)
sj':state
omj':option message
Htj:vtransition (IM j) lj (s j, om) = (sj', omj')
_om:option message
Hs:protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (state_update s i si, _om)
n:i <> j
n':j <> i
Hgen:protocol_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (state_update (state_update s i si) j sj',
  omj')
protocol_state_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (state_update (state_update s i si) j sj')

          eexists _. apply Hgen.
    Qed.

  End composite_vlsm.

End VLSM_composition.
These basic projection lemmas relate the protocol_state_prop and protocol_transition of a composite VLSM back to those conditions holding over projections to individual components of the state.
Because the composition may have validly produced messages that are not protocol in an individual component (by interaction between components), We cannot just use properties protocol_prop (IM i) or protocol_transition (IM i). For simplicity these lemmas use pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i).
This does not precisely reflect the set of messages and transitions that can actually be seen in projections of transitions of the composite VLSM, but seems to be the best we can do with a result type that doesn't mention the other components or the composition constraint of the composite.
Later in this file a composite_constrained_projection_vlsm is defined that shares the states of IM i which is more precise. 
message, index:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision index
H:Inhabited index
IM:index -> VLSM message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
s:vstate (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
i:index
protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s ->
protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) (s i)


message, index:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision index
H:Inhabited index
IM:index -> VLSM message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
s:vstate (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
i:index
protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s ->
protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) (s i)

  
message, index:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision index
H:Inhabited index
IM:index -> VLSM message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
s:vstate (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
i:index
om:option message
Hproto:protocol_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
  (s, om)
protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) (s i)

  
message, index:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision index
H:Inhabited index
IM:index -> VLSM message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
s:vstate (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
i:index
om:option message
Hproto:protocol_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
  (s, om)
preloaded_protocol_state_prop (IM i) (s i)

  
message, index:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision index
H:Inhabited index
IM:index -> VLSM message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
s:state
i:index
om:option message
Hproto:protocol_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
  (s, om)
preloaded_protocol_state_prop (IM i) (s i)

  
message, index:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision index
H:Inhabited index
IM:index -> VLSM message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
s:state
i:index
om:option message
som:=(s, om):(state * option message)%type
Hproto:protocol_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) som
preloaded_protocol_state_prop (IM i) (s i)

message, index:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision index
H:Inhabited index
IM:index -> VLSM message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
i:index
l:label
s:state
_om:option message
Hproto1:protocol_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
  (s, _om)
_s:state
om:option message
Hproto2:protocol_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
  (_s, om)
Hv:valid l (s, om)
IHHproto1:preloaded_protocol_state_prop 
  (IM i) (fst (s, _om) i)
IHHproto2:preloaded_protocol_state_prop 
  (IM i) (fst (_s, om) i)
preloaded_protocol_state_prop 
  (IM i) (fst (transition l (s, om)) i)

    exact (proj2_sig is i).

    exact (proj2_sig (vs0 (IM i))).

EqDecision0:EqDecision index

composite_state IM * option message ->

X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message

l:label

  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
  (s, _om)
_s:state
om:option message
Hproto2:protocol_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
  (_s, om)
Hv:valid l (s, om)
IHHproto1:preloaded_protocol_state_prop 
  (IM i) (fst (s, _om) i)

  (IM i) (fst (_s, om) i)

message, index:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision index
H:Inhabited index
IM:index -> VLSM message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
i, j:index
lj:vlabel (IM j)
s:state
_om:option message
Hproto1:protocol_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
  (s, _om)
_s:state
om:option message
Hproto2:protocol_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
  (_s, om)
Hv:valid
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j lj)
  (s, om)
IHHproto1:preloaded_protocol_state_prop 
  (IM i) (fst (s, _om) i)
IHHproto2:preloaded_protocol_state_prop 
  (IM i) (fst (_s, om) i)
preloaded_protocol_state_prop (IM i)
  (fst
     (transition
        (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j lj)
        (s, om)) i)

    
message, index:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision index
H:Inhabited index
IM:index -> VLSM message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
i, j:index
lj:vlabel (IM j)
s:state
_om:option message
Hproto1:protocol_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
  (s, _om)
_s:state
om:option message
Hproto2:protocol_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
  (_s, om)
Hv:valid
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j lj)
  (s, om)
IHHproto1:preloaded_protocol_state_prop 
  (IM i) (fst (s, _om) i)
IHHproto2:preloaded_protocol_state_prop 
  (IM i) (fst (_s, om) i)
preloaded_protocol_state_prop (IM i)
  (fst
     (let (si', om') :=
        vtransition (IM j) lj (s j, om) in
      (state_update IM s j si', om')) i)

    
message, index:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision index
H:Inhabited index
IM:index -> VLSM message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
i, j:index
lj:vlabel (IM j)
s:state
_om:option message
Hproto1:protocol_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
  (s, _om)
_s:state
om:option message
Hproto2:protocol_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
  (_s, om)
Hv:valid
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j lj)
  (s, om)
IHHproto1:preloaded_protocol_state_prop 
  (IM i) (fst (s, _om) i)
IHHproto2:preloaded_protocol_state_prop 
  (IM i) (fst (_s, om) i)
preloaded_protocol_state_prop (IM i)
  (fst
     (state_update IM s j
        (fst (vtransition (IM j) lj (s j, om))),
     snd (vtransition (IM j) lj (s j, om))) i)

message, index:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision index
H:Inhabited index

     (composite_vlsm IM constraint)) (s, om)

  assumption.
Qed.


message, V:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision V
H:Inhabited V
IM:V -> VLSM message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
l:label
s:state
im:option message
s':state
om:option message
protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) l (s, im)
  (s', om) ->
protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM (projT1 l)))
  (projT2 l) (s (projT1 l), im) (s' (projT1 l), om)


message, V:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision V
H:Inhabited V
IM:V -> VLSM message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
l:label
s:state
im:option message
s':state
om:option message
protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) l (s, im)
  (s', om) ->
protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM (projT1 l)))
  (projT2 l) (s (projT1 l), im) (s' (projT1 l), om)

  
message, V:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision V
H:Inhabited V
IM:V -> VLSM message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
l:label
s:state
im:option message
s':state
om:option message
Hptrans:protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) l
  (s, im) (s', om)
protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM (projT1 l)))
  (projT2 l) (s (projT1 l), im) (s' (projT1 l), om)

  
message, V:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision V
H:Inhabited V
IM:V -> VLSM message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:V
lj:vlabel (IM j)
s:state
im:option message
s':state
om:option message
Hptrans:protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
  (existT (fun n : V => vlabel (IM n)) j lj)
  (s, im) (s', om)
protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
     (IM
        (projT1
           (existT (fun n : V => vlabel (IM n)) j lj))))
  (projT2 (existT (fun n : V => vlabel (IM n)) j lj))
  (s
     (projT1
        (existT (fun n : V => vlabel (IM n)) j lj)),
  im)
  (s'
     (projT1
        (existT (fun n : V => vlabel (IM n)) j lj)),
  om)

  
message, V:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision V
H:Inhabited V
IM:V -> VLSM message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:V
lj:vlabel (IM j)
s:state
im:option message
s':state
om:option message
Hpvalid:protocol_valid
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
  (existT (fun n : V => vlabel (IM n)) j lj)
  (s, im)
Htrans:transition
  (existT (fun n : V => vlabel (IM n)) j lj)
  (s, im) = (s', om)
protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
     (IM
        (projT1
           (existT (fun n : V => vlabel (IM n)) j lj))))
  (projT2 (existT (fun n : V => vlabel (IM n)) j lj))
  (s
     (projT1
        (existT (fun n : V => vlabel (IM n)) j lj)),
  im)
  (s'
     (projT1
        (existT (fun n : V => vlabel (IM n)) j lj)),
  om)

  (s, im)

  (existT (fun n : V => vlabel (IM n)) j
     lj) (s, im)

  (existT (fun n : V => vlabel (IM n)) j lj)
  (s, im) = (s', om)

message, V:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision V
H:Inhabited V
IM:V -> VLSM message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:V
lj:vlabel (IM j)
s:state
im:option message
s':state
om:option message
Hpvalid:protocol_valid
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
  (existT (fun n : V => vlabel (IM n)) j lj)
  (s, im)
Htrans:transition
  (existT (fun n : V => vlabel (IM n)) j lj)
  (s, im) = (s', om)
vtransition (IM j) lj (s j, im) = (s' j, om)

    
message, V:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision V
H:Inhabited V
IM:V -> VLSM message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:V
lj:vlabel (IM j)
s:state
im:option message
s':state
om:option message
Hpvalid:protocol_valid
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
  (existT (fun n : V => vlabel (IM n)) j lj)
  (s, im)
Htrans:(let (si', om') :=
   vtransition (IM j) lj (s j, im) in
 (state_update IM s j si', om')) = 
(s', om)
vtransition (IM j) lj (s j, im) = (s' j, om)

  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
  (existT (fun n : V => vlabel (IM n)) j lj)
  (s, im)
s0:state
o:option message
Htrans:(state_update IM s j s0, o) = (s', om)
(s0, o) = (s' j, om)

message, V:Type

s0 = s0

    reflexivity.
Qed.


message, V:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision V
H:Inhabited V
IM:V -> VLSM message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
l:label
s:state
im:option message
s':state
om:option message
protocol_transition X l (s, im) (s', om) ->
protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM (projT1 l)))
  (projT2 l) (s (projT1 l), im) (s' (projT1 l), om)

message, V:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision V
H:Inhabited V
IM:V -> VLSM message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
l:label
s:state
im:option message
s':state
om:option message
protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) l (s, im)
  (s', om) ->
protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM (projT1 l)))
  (projT2 l) (s (projT1 l), im) (s' (projT1 l), om)

  apply protocol_transition_preloaded_project_active.
Qed.


V:Type
i:V
message:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision V
H:Inhabited V
IM:V -> VLSM message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
l:vlabel X
s:state
im:option message
s':state
om:option message
protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) l (s, im)
  (s', om) ->
s i = s' i \/
(exists li : (fun n : V => vlabel (IM n)) i,
   l = existT (fun n : V => vlabel (IM n)) i li /\
   protocol_transition
     (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) li
     (s i, im) (s' i, om))

composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
l:vlabel X
s:state
im:option message
s':state
om:option message
protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) l (s, im)
  (s', om) ->
s i = s' i \/
(exists li : (fun n : V => vlabel (IM n)) i,
   l = existT (fun n : V => vlabel (IM n)) i li /\
   protocol_transition
     (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) li
     (s i, im) (s' i, om))

  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) l

   protocol_transition

composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop

Hptrans:protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
  (existT (fun n : V => vlabel (IM n)) j lj)
  (s, im) (s', om)
s i = s' i \/
(exists li : vlabel (IM i),
   existT (fun n : V => vlabel (IM n)) j lj =
   existT (fun n : V => vlabel (IM n)) i li /\
   protocol_transition
     (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) li
     (s i, im) (s' i, om))

  
V:Type
i:V
message:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision V
H:Inhabited V
IM:V -> VLSM message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:V
lj:vlabel (IM j)
s:state
im:option message
s':state
om:option message
Hptrans:protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
  (existT (fun n : V => vlabel (IM n)) j lj)
  (s, im) (s', om)
e:i = j
s i = s' i \/
(exists li : vlabel (IM i),
   existT (fun n : V => vlabel (IM n)) j lj =
   existT (fun n : V => vlabel (IM n)) i li /\
   protocol_transition
     (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) li
     (s i, im) (s' i, om))
V:Type
i:V
message:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision V
H:Inhabited V
IM:V -> VLSM message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:V
lj:vlabel (IM j)
s:state
im:option message
s':state
om:option message
Hptrans:protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
  (existT (fun n : V => vlabel (IM n)) j lj)
  (s, im) (s', om)
n:i <> j
s i = s' i \/
(exists li : vlabel (IM i),
   existT (fun n : V => vlabel (IM n)) j lj =
   existT (fun n : V => vlabel (IM n)) i li /\
   protocol_transition
     (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) li
     (s i, im) (s' i, om))

  
V:Type
i:V
message:Type
EqDecision0:EqDecision V
H:Inhabited V
IM:V -> VLSM message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:V
lj:vlabel (IM j)
s:state
im:option message
s':state
om:option message
Hptrans:protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
  (existT (fun n : V => vlabel (IM n)) j lj)
  (s, im) (s', om)
e:i = j
s i = s' i \/
(exists li : vlabel (IM i),
   existT (fun n : V => vlabel (IM n)) j lj =
   existT (fun n : V => vlabel (IM n)) i li /\
   protocol_transition
     (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) li
     (s i, im) (s' i, om))

  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)

   existT (fun n : V => vlabel (IM n)) i li /\
   protocol_transition

     (s i, im) (s' i, om))

    apply protocol_transition_preloaded_project_active.

    reflexivity.

(exists li : (fun n : V => vlabel (IM n)) i,
   l = existT (fun n : V => vlabel (IM n)) i li /\
   protocol_transition
     (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) li
     (s i, im) (s' i, om))

  apply protocol_transition_preloaded_project_any.
Qed.

Section projections.

Composite VLSM projections

Let us fix an indexed set of VLSMs IM and their composition X using constraint. 
  Context {message : Type}
          {index : Type}
          {IndEqDec : EqDecision index}
          (IM : index -> VLSM message)
          `{i0 : Inhabited index}
          (T := composite_type IM)
          (constraint : composite_label IM -> composite_state IM * option message -> Prop)
          (X := composite_vlsm IM constraint)
          .
The VLSM_type of a projection of X to component i is the type of the ith component of X. We defined the signature of the projection to be the same as that of the component, with the exception that the initial_messages for the projection are defined to be all protocol_messages of X: 
  Definition composite_vlsm_constrained_projection_sig
    (i : index)
    : VLSM_sign (type (IM i))
    :=
    {|   initial_state_prop := vinitial_state_prop (IM i)
     ;   initial_message_prop := fun pmi => exists xm : protocol_message X, proj1_sig xm = pmi
     ;   s0 := vs0 (IM i)
     ;   m0 := vm0 (IM i)
     ;   l0 := vl0 (IM i)
    |}.
projection_validity is defined as the projection of protocol_validity of X: 
  Definition projection_valid
    (i : index)
    (li : vlabel (IM i))
    (siomi : vstate (IM i) * option message)
    :=
    let (si, omi) := siomi in
    exists (s : vstate X),
      s i = si /\ protocol_valid X (existT _ i li) (s, omi).
Since projection_validity is derived from protocol_validity, which in turn depends on validity in the component, it is easy to see that projection_validity implies validity in the component. 
  
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
i:index
li:vlabel (IM i)
siomi:(vstate (IM i) * option message)%type
Hcomposite:projection_valid i li siomi
vvalid (IM i) li siomi

  
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
i:index
li:vlabel (IM i)
siomi:(vstate (IM i) * option message)%type
Hcomposite:projection_valid i li siomi
vvalid (IM i) li siomi

    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
i:index
li:vlabel (IM i)
si:vstate (IM i)
omi:option message
Hcomposite:projection_valid i li (si, omi)
vvalid (IM i) li (si, omi)

    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
i:index
li:vlabel (IM i)
si:vstate (IM i)
omi:option message
s:vstate X
Hsi:s i = si
Hvalid:valid
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) i
     li) (s, omi)
vvalid (IM i) li (si, omi)

    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
i:index
li:vlabel (IM i)
omi:option message
s:vstate X
Hvalid:constrained_composite_valid IM constraint
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) i
     li) (s, omi)
vvalid (IM i) li (s i, omi)

    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
i:index
li:vlabel (IM i)
omi:option message
s:vstate X
Hvalid:free_composite_valid IM
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) i
     li) (s, omi)
Hconstraint:constraint
  (existT
     (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) i
     li) (s, omi)
vvalid (IM i) li (s i, omi)

    assumption.
  Qed.
We define the projection of X to index i as the VLSM whose signature is the composite_vlsm_constrained_projection_signature corresponding to i, having the same transition function as IM i, the ith component of 
  Definition composite_vlsm_constrained_projection_machine
    (i : index)
    : VLSM_class (composite_vlsm_constrained_projection_sig i) :=
    {|  transition :=  vtransition (IM i)
     ;  valid := projection_valid i
    |}.

  Definition composite_vlsm_constrained_projection
    (i : index)
    : VLSM message
    := mk_vlsm (composite_vlsm_constrained_projection_machine i).

  Section fixed_projection.

Projection traces are Byzantine

Let us fix an index j and let Xj be the projection of X on component j.
In this section we establish some basic properties for projections, building up to Lemma proj_pre_loaded_with_all_messages_incl, which guarantees that all protocol_traces of Xj are also protocol_traces for the pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm associated to the component IM j. In particular this ensures that the byzantine traces of IM j include all protocol_traces of Xj (see Lemma pre_loaded_with_all_messages_alt_eq). 
    Context
      (j : index)
      (Xj := composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j)
      .
As a basic property of the definition of initial states it follows that the jth component of an initial_state of X is initial for Xj 
    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
s:vstate X
Hinit:vinitial_state_prop X s
vinitial_state_prop Xj (s j)

    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
s:vstate X
Hinit:vinitial_state_prop X s
vinitial_state_prop Xj (s j)

      
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
s:vstate X
Hinit:vinitial_state_prop (IM j) (s j)
vinitial_state_prop Xj (s j)

      assumption.
    Qed.
Since all protocol_messages of X become initial_messages in Xj, the following result is not surprising. 
    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
iom:option message
HpmX:option_protocol_message_prop X iom
option_protocol_message_prop Xj iom

    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
iom:option message
HpmX:option_protocol_message_prop X iom
option_protocol_message_prop Xj iom

      
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
iom:option message
HpmX:option_protocol_message_prop X iom
protocol_prop Xj (proj1_sig (vs0 Xj), iom)

      
message, index:Type

IM:index -> VLSM message

composite_state IM * option message ->

Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
im:message
HpmX:option_protocol_message_prop X (Some im)
protocol_prop Xj (proj1_sig (vs0 Xj), Some im)
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
HpmX:option_protocol_message_prop X None
protocol_prop Xj (proj1_sig (vs0 Xj), None)

      
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
im:message
HpmX:option_protocol_message_prop X (Some im)
protocol_prop Xj (proj1_sig (vs0 Xj), Some im)
 
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
im:message
HpmX:option_protocol_message_prop X (Some im)
Hinit:forall im : initial_message,
let s := proj1_sig s0 in
let om := Some (proj1_sig im) in
protocol_prop Xj (s, om)
protocol_prop Xj (proj1_sig (vs0 Xj), Some im)

        
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
im:message
HpmX:option_protocol_message_prop X (Some im)
Hinit:forall im : initial_message,
let s := proj1_sig s0 in
let om := Some (proj1_sig im) in
protocol_prop Xj (s, om)
Hpim:protocol_message_prop X im
protocol_prop Xj (proj1_sig (vs0 Xj), Some im)

        
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
im:message
HpmX:option_protocol_message_prop X (Some im)
Hinit:forall im : initial_message,
let s := proj1_sig s0 in
let om := Some (proj1_sig im) in
protocol_prop Xj (s, om)
Hpim:protocol_message_prop X im
Hini:vinitial_message_prop Xj im
protocol_prop Xj (proj1_sig (vs0 Xj), Some im)

        
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
im:message
HpmX:option_protocol_message_prop X (Some im)
Hini:vinitial_message_prop Xj im
Hinit:protocol_prop Xj
  (proj1_sig (vs0 (IM j)), Some im)
Hpim:protocol_message_prop X im
protocol_prop Xj (proj1_sig (vs0 Xj), Some im)

        assumption.
      
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
HpmX:option_protocol_message_prop X None
protocol_prop Xj (proj1_sig (vs0 Xj), None)
 apply (protocol_initial_state Xj).
    Qed.
Interestingly enough, Xj cannot produce any additional messages than the initial ones available from X.

message, index:Type

message, index:Type

IM:index -> VLSM message

constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop

j:index

im:message
Him:initial_message_prop im
om:=Some
  (proj1_sig
     (exist
        (fun m : message => initial_message_prop m)
        im Him)):option message
Hpmj:protocol_prop Xj (s, om)
option_protocol_message_prop X om

        
message, index:Type

  proj1_sig xm = im
Hpmj:protocol_prop Xj (s, Some im)
option_protocol_message_prop X (Some im)

        
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
s:=proj1_sig (vs0 (IM j)):state
im, m:message
Hpm:protocol_message_prop X m
Heq:proj1_sig
  (exist
     (fun m : message =>
      protocol_message_prop X m) m Hpm) = im
Hpmj:protocol_prop Xj (s, Some im)
option_protocol_message_prop X (Some im)

        subst; assumption.

sX:vstate X
Heqs:sX j = s
Hv:protocol_valid X
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
  (sX, om)
H0:vtransition (IM j) l (s, om) = (sj, iom)

message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
iom:option message
sj:state
Hpmj:protocol_prop Xj (sj, iom)
l:label
_om:option message
_s:state
om:option message
sX:vstate X
Hps:protocol_prop Xj (sX j, _om)
Hpm:protocol_prop Xj (_s, om)
Hv:protocol_valid X
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
  (sX, om)
H0:vtransition (IM j) l (sX j, om) = (sj, iom)
s':state
om':option message
Heqsom':(let (si', om') :=
   vtransition (IM j) l (sX j, om) in
 (state_update IM sX j si', om')) =
(s', om')
Ht:vtransition X
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
  (sX, om) = (s', om')
option_protocol_message_prop X iom

        
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
iom:option message
sj:state
Hpmj:protocol_prop Xj (sj, iom)
l:label
_om:option message
_s:state
om:option message
sX:vstate X
Hps:protocol_prop Xj (sX j, _om)
Hpm:protocol_prop Xj (_s, om)
Hv:protocol_valid X
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
  (sX, om)
H0:vtransition (IM j) l (sX j, om) = (sj, iom)
s':state
om':option message
Heqsom':(state_update IM sX j sj, iom) = (s', om')
Ht:vtransition X
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
  (sX, om) = (s', om')
option_protocol_message_prop X iom

        
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
sj:state
om':option message
Hpmj:protocol_prop Xj (sj, om')
l:label
_om:option message
_s:state
om:option message
sX:vstate X
Hps:protocol_prop Xj (sX j, _om)
Hpm:protocol_prop Xj (_s, om)
Hv:protocol_valid X
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
  (sX, om)
H0:vtransition (IM j) l (sX j, om) = (sj, om')
Ht:vtransition X
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
  (sX, om) = (state_update IM sX j sj, om')
Heqsom':(state_update IM sX j sj, om') =
(state_update IM sX j sj, om')
option_protocol_message_prop X om'

        
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
sj:state
om':option message
Hpmj:protocol_prop Xj (sj, om')
l:label
_om:option message
_s:state
om:option message
sX:vstate X
Hps:protocol_prop Xj (sX j, _om)
Hpm:protocol_prop Xj (_s, om)
Hv:protocol_valid X
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
  (sX, om)
H0:vtransition (IM j) l (sX j, om) = (sj, om')
Ht:vtransition X
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
  (sX, om) = (state_update IM sX j sj, om')
Heqsom':(state_update IM sX j sj, om') =
(state_update IM sX j sj, om')
protocol_prop X (state_update IM sX j sj, om')

        
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
sj:state
om':option message
Hpmj:protocol_prop Xj (sj, om')
l:label
_om:option message
_s:state
om:option message
sX:vstate X
Hps:protocol_prop Xj (sX j, _om)
Hpm:protocol_prop Xj (_s, om)
Hv:protocol_valid X
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
  (sX, om)
H0:vtransition (IM j) l (sX j, om) = (sj, om')
Ht:vtransition X
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
  (sX, om) = (state_update IM sX j sj, om')
Heqsom':(state_update IM sX j sj, om') =
(state_update IM sX j sj, om')
protocol_prop X
  (vtransition X
     (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
     (sX, om))

        
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
sj:state
om':option message
Hpmj:protocol_prop Xj (sj, om')
l:label
_om:option message
_s:state
om:option message
sX:vstate X
Hps:protocol_prop Xj (sX j, _om)
Hpm:protocol_prop Xj (_s, om)
Hv:protocol_valid X
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
  (sX, om)
H0:vtransition (IM j) l (sX j, om) = (sj, om')
Ht:vtransition X
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
  (sX, om) = (state_update IM sX j sj, om')
Heqsom':(state_update IM sX j sj, om') =
(state_update IM sX j sj, om')
protocol_valid X
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
  (sX, om)

        assumption.
    Qed.
As a stepping stone towards proving trace inclusion between Xj and the pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm associated to IM j, we prove that the protocol_property is transferred. 
    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
PreLoaded:=pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM j):VLSM message
s:state
om:option message
Hps:protocol_prop Xj (s, om)
protocol_prop PreLoaded (s, om)

composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
PreLoaded:=pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM j):VLSM message
s:state
om:option message
Hps:protocol_prop Xj (s, om)
protocol_prop PreLoaded (s, om)

      
message, index:Type

IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
PreLoaded:=pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM j):VLSM message
s:state
