is:initial_state
s0:=proj1_sig is:state
protocol_prop PreLoaded (s0, None)
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
PreLoaded:=pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM j):VLSM message
s:state
om:option message
im:initial_message
s0:=proj1_sig Common.s0:state
om0:=Some (proj1_sig im):option message
protocol_prop PreLoaded (s0, om0)
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
PreLoaded:=pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM j):VLSM message
s:state
om:option message
l:label
s0:state
_om:option message
Hps1:protocol_prop Xj (s0, _om)
_s:state
om0:option message
Hps2:protocol_prop Xj (_s, om0)
Hv:valid l (s0, om0)
IHHps1:protocol_prop PreLoaded (s0, _om)
IHHps2:protocol_prop PreLoaded (_s, om0)
protocol_prop PreLoaded (transition l (s0, om0))

      
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
PreLoaded:=pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM j):VLSM message
s:state
om:option message
is:initial_state
s0:=proj1_sig is:state
protocol_prop PreLoaded (s0, None)
 apply (protocol_initial_state PreLoaded is).
      
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
PreLoaded:=pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM j):VLSM message
s:state
om:option message
im:initial_message
s0:=proj1_sig Common.s0:state
om0:=Some (proj1_sig im):option message
protocol_prop PreLoaded (s0, om0)
 
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index

constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->

Him:initial_message_prop m
s0:=proj1_sig Common.s0:state
om0:=Some
  (proj1_sig
     (exist
        (fun m : message =>
         initial_message_prop m) m Him)):option message
protocol_prop PreLoaded (s0, om0)

message, index:Type

IM:index -> VLSM message

om0:=Some m:option message
Him:vinitial_message_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) m
protocol_prop PreLoaded (s0, om0)

        apply (protocol_initial_message PreLoaded (exist _ m Him)).
      
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
PreLoaded:=pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM j):VLSM message
s:state
om:option message
l:label
s0:state
_om:option message
Hps1:protocol_prop Xj (s0, _om)
_s:state
om0:option message
Hps2:protocol_prop Xj (_s, om0)
Hv:valid l (s0, om0)
IHHps1:protocol_prop PreLoaded (s0, _om)
IHHps2:protocol_prop PreLoaded (_s, om0)
protocol_prop PreLoaded (transition l (s0, om0))
 
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
PreLoaded:=pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM j):VLSM message
s:state
om:option message
l:label
s0:state
_om:option message
Hps1:protocol_prop Xj (s0, _om)
_s:state
om0:option message
Hps2:protocol_prop Xj (_s, om0)
Hv:valid l (s0, om0)
IHHps1:protocol_prop PreLoaded (s0, _om)
IHHps2:protocol_prop PreLoaded (_s, om0)
valid l (s0, om0)

        
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message

s:state
om:option message
l:label
s0:state
_om:option message
Hps1:protocol_prop Xj (s0, _om)
_s:state
om0:option message
Hps2:protocol_prop Xj (_s, om0)
Hv:valid l (s0, om0)
IHHps1:protocol_prop PreLoaded (s0, _om)
IHHps2:protocol_prop PreLoaded (_s, om0)
projection_valid j l (s0, om0)
 assumption.
    Qed.
We can now finally prove the main result for this section:

X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
PreLoaded:=pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM j):VLSM message
VLSM_incl Xj PreLoaded

composite_state IM * option message ->

om:option message
Hv:valid l (s, om)
projection_valid j l (s, om)

        assumption.
    Qed.

  End fixed_projection.

  Section projection_friendliness_sufficient_condition.

A sufficient condition for being projection_friendly.

  Context
  (j : index)
  (Xj := composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j)
  .
This condition states that protocol_validity in a projection Xj
can be lifted to any protocol_state in X which projects to the corresponding Xj state. 
  Definition projection_friendliness_sufficient_condition
    := forall
      (lj : vlabel (IM j))
      (sj : vstate (IM j))
      (om : option message)
      (Hpv : protocol_valid Xj lj (sj, om))
      (s : vstate X)
      (Hs : protocol_state_prop X s)
      (Hsi : s j = sj)
      , vvalid X (existT _ j lj) (s, om).

  
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
l:label
s:state
om:option message
Hv:protocol_valid Xj l (s, om)
option_protocol_message_prop X om

  
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
l:label
s:state
om:option message
Hv:protocol_valid Xj l (s, om)
option_protocol_message_prop X om

    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
l:label
s:state
om:option message
Hpsj:protocol_state_prop Xj s
Hpmj:option_protocol_message_prop Xj om
sx:vstate X
Hs:sx j = s
HpsX:protocol_state_prop X sx
HpmX:option_protocol_message_prop X om
Hv:valid
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
  (sx, om)
option_protocol_message_prop X om

    assumption.
  Qed.

  
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index

constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
sj:vstate (IM j)
Hinitj:vinitial_state_prop (IM j) sj
vinitial_state_prop X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j sj)

  (state_update IM (proj1_sig (composite_s0 IM)) j sj
     i)

message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
sj:vstate (IM j)
Hinitj:vinitial_state_prop (IM j) sj
i:index
n:i <> j
s:state
Hs:initial_state_prop s
vinitial_state_prop (IM i)
  (proj1_sig
     (exist (fun s : state => initial_state_prop s) s
        Hs))

      assumption.
  Qed.

  
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message

composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
Hfr:projection_friendliness_sufficient_condition
s:state
om:option message
Hp:protocol_prop Xj (s, om)
protocol_state_prop X (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)

  
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index

composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop

j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
Hfr:projection_friendliness_sufficient_condition
s:state
om:option message

protocol_state_prop X (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)

    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
Hfr:projection_friendliness_sufficient_condition
s:state
om:option message
som:(state * option message)%type
Heqsom:som = (s, om)
Hp:protocol_prop Xj som
protocol_state_prop X (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)

    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
Hfr:projection_friendliness_sufficient_condition
s:state
som:(state * option message)%type
Hp:protocol_prop Xj som
forall om : option message,
som = (s, om) ->
protocol_state_prop X (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
 
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
Hfr:projection_friendliness_sufficient_condition
som:(state * option message)%type
Hp:protocol_prop Xj som
forall (s : state) (om : option message),
som = (s, om) ->
protocol_state_prop X (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)

    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
Hfr:projection_friendliness_sufficient_condition
is:initial_state
s:=proj1_sig is:state
protocol_state_prop X (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
Hfr:projection_friendliness_sufficient_condition
im:initial_message
s:=proj1_sig s0:state
om:=Some (proj1_sig im):option message
protocol_state_prop X (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
Hfr:projection_friendliness_sufficient_condition
l:label
s:state
_om:option message
Hp1:protocol_prop Xj (s, _om)
_s:state
om:option message
Hp2:protocol_prop Xj (_s, om)
Hv:valid l (s, om)
IHHp1:forall (s0 : state) (om : option message),
(s, _om) = (s0, om) ->
protocol_state_prop X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s0)
IHHp2:forall (s : state) (om0 : option message),
(_s, om) = (s, om0) ->
protocol_state_prop X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
s0:state
om0:option message
H0:vtransition (IM j) l (s, om) = (s0, om0)
protocol_state_prop X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s0)

Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
Hfr:projection_friendliness_sufficient_condition
is:initial_state
s:=proj1_sig is:state
protocol_state_prop X (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
 
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
Hfr:projection_friendliness_sufficient_condition
is:initial_state
s:=proj1_sig is:state
protocol_prop X (lift_to_composite_state IM j s, None)

      
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
Hfr:projection_friendliness_sufficient_condition
is':state
Hinit:initial_state_prop is'
s:=proj1_sig
  (exist (fun s : state => initial_state_prop s)
     is' Hinit):state
protocol_prop X (lift_to_composite_state IM j s, None)

      
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
Hfr:projection_friendliness_sufficient_condition
is':state
Hinit:vinitial_state_prop (IM j) is'
s:=is':state
protocol_prop X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j is', None)

      
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
Hfr:projection_friendliness_sufficient_condition
is':state
Hinit:vinitial_state_prop (IM j) is'
s:=is':state
HinitX:vinitial_state_prop X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j is')
protocol_prop X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j is', None)

      
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
Hfr:projection_friendliness_sufficient_condition
is':state
Hinit:vinitial_state_prop (IM j) is'
s:=is':state
initX:let s0X := proj1_sig (composite_s0 IM) in
composite_state IM
HeqinitX:initX = lift_to_composite_state IM j is'
HinitX:vinitial_state_prop X initX
protocol_prop X (initX, None)

      
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
Hfr:projection_friendliness_sufficient_condition
is':state
Hinit:vinitial_state_prop (IM j) is'
s:=is':state
initX:let s0X := proj1_sig (composite_s0 IM) in
composite_state IM
HeqinitX:initX = lift_to_composite_state IM j is'
HinitX:vinitial_state_prop X initX
protocol_prop X
  (proj1_sig
     (exist (vinitial_state_prop X) initX HinitX),
  None)

      apply (protocol_initial_state X).

message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
Hfr:projection_friendliness_sufficient_condition
im:initial_message
s:=proj1_sig s0:state
om:=Some (proj1_sig im):option message
proj1_sig (vs0 X) =
state_update IM (proj1_sig (composite_s0 IM)) j s

        rewrite state_update_id; reflexivity.
    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
Hfr:projection_friendliness_sufficient_condition
l:label
s:state
_om:option message
Hp1:protocol_prop Xj (s, _om)
_s:state
om:option message
Hp2:protocol_prop Xj (_s, om)
Hv:valid l (s, om)
IHHp1:forall (s0 : state) (om : option message),
(s, _om) = (s0, om) ->
protocol_state_prop X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s0)
IHHp2:forall (s : state) (om0 : option message),
(_s, om) = (s, om0) ->
protocol_state_prop X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
s0:state
om0:option message
H0:vtransition (IM j) l (s, om) = (s0, om0)
protocol_state_prop X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s0)

l:label
s:state
_om:option message
Hp1:protocol_prop Xj (s, _om)
_s:state
om:option message
Hp2:protocol_prop Xj (_s, om)
Hv:valid l (s, om)
IHHp1:protocol_state_prop X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
IHHp2:forall (s : state) (om0 : option message),
(_s, om) = (s, om0) ->
protocol_state_prop X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
s0:state
om0:option message
H0:vtransition (IM j) l (s, om) = (s0, om0)
protocol_state_prop X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s0)

      
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
Hfr:projection_friendliness_sufficient_condition
l:label
s:state
_om:option message
Hp1:protocol_prop Xj (s, _om)
_s:state
om:option message
Hp2:protocol_prop Xj (_s, om)
Hv:valid l (s, om)
IHHp1:protocol_state_prop X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
IHHp2:forall (s : state) (om0 : option message),
(_s, om) = (s, om0) ->
protocol_state_prop X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
s0:state
om0:option message
H0:vtransition (IM j) l (s, om) = (s0, om0)
protocol_prop X (lift_to_composite_state IM j s0, om0)

      
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
Hfr:projection_friendliness_sufficient_condition
l:label
s:state
_om:option message
Hp1:protocol_prop Xj (s, _om)
_s:state
om:option message
Hp2:protocol_prop Xj (_s, om)
Hv:valid l (s, om)
IHHp1:protocol_state_prop X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
IHHp2:forall (s : state) (om0 : option message),
(_s, om) = (s, om0) ->
protocol_state_prop X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
s0:state
om0:option message
H0:vtransition (IM j) l (s, om) = (s0, om0)
protocol_prop X
  (vtransition X
     (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
     (lift_to_composite_state IM j s, om))
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
Hfr:projection_friendliness_sufficient_condition
l:label
s:state
_om:option message
Hp1:protocol_prop Xj (s, _om)
_s:state
om:option message
Hp2:protocol_prop Xj (_s, om)
Hv:valid l (s, om)
IHHp1:protocol_state_prop X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
IHHp2:forall (s : state) (om0 : option message),
(_s, om) = (s, om0) ->
protocol_state_prop X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
s0:state
om0:option message
H0:vtransition (IM j) l (s, om) = (s0, om0)
vtransition X
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s, om) =
(lift_to_composite_state IM j s0, om0)

_s:state
om:option message
Hp2:protocol_prop Xj (_s, om)
Hv:valid l (s, om)

  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
IHHp2:forall (s : state) (om0 : option message),
(_s, om) = (s, om0) ->
protocol_state_prop X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
s0:state
om0:option message
H0:vtransition (IM j) l (s, om) = (s0, om0)
protocol_prop X
  (vtransition X
     (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
     (lift_to_composite_state IM j s, om))

        
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message

Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message

l:label
s:state

_s:state
om:option message
Hp2:protocol_prop Xj (_s, om)
Hv:valid l (s, om)
IHHp1:protocol_state_prop X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
IHHp2:forall (s : state) (om0 : option message),
(_s, om) = (s, om0) ->
protocol_state_prop X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
s0:state
om0:option message
H0:vtransition (IM j) l (s, om) = (s0, om0)
Hpvj:protocol_valid Xj l (s, om)
protocol_prop X
  (vtransition X
     (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
     (lift_to_composite_state IM j s, om))

        
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
l:label
s:state
om:option message
Hfr:lift_to_composite_state IM j s j = s ->
vvalid X
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s, om)
_om:option message
Hp1:protocol_prop Xj (s, _om)
_s:state
Hp2:protocol_prop Xj (_s, om)
Hv:valid l (s, om)
IHHp1:protocol_state_prop X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
IHHp2:forall (s : state) (om0 : option message),
(_s, om) = (s, om0) ->
protocol_state_prop X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
s0:state
om0:option message
H0:vtransition (IM j) l (s, om) = (s0, om0)
Hpvj:protocol_valid Xj l (s, om)
protocol_prop X
  (vtransition X
     (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
     (lift_to_composite_state IM j s, om))

        
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
l:label
s:state
om:option message
Hfr:state_update IM (proj1_sig (composite_s0 IM)) j
  s j = s ->
vvalid X
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s, om)
_om:option message
Hp1:protocol_prop Xj (s, _om)
_s:state
Hp2:protocol_prop Xj (_s, om)
Hv:valid l (s, om)
IHHp1:protocol_state_prop X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
IHHp2:forall (s : state) (om0 : option message),
(_s, om) = (s, om0) ->
protocol_state_prop X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
s0:state
om0:option message
H0:vtransition (IM j) l (s, om) = (s0, om0)
Hpvj:protocol_valid Xj l (s, om)
protocol_prop X
  (vtransition X
     (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
     (lift_to_composite_state IM j s, om))

        
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index

s:state
om:option message
Hfr:s = s ->
vvalid X
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s, om)
_om:option message

_s:state
Hp2:protocol_prop Xj (_s, om)
Hv:valid l (s, om)
IHHp1:protocol_state_prop X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
IHHp2:forall (s : state) (om0 : option message),
(_s, om) = (s, om0) ->
protocol_state_prop X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)

  (vtransition X
     (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
     (lift_to_composite_state IM j s, om))

        
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
l:label
s:state
om:option message
Hfr:vvalid X
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s, om)
_om:option message
Hp1:protocol_prop Xj (s, _om)
_s:state
Hp2:protocol_prop Xj (_s, om)
Hv:valid l (s, om)
IHHp1:protocol_state_prop X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
IHHp2:forall (s : state) (om0 : option message),
(_s, om) = (s, om0) ->
protocol_state_prop X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
s0:state
om0:option message
H0:vtransition (IM j) l (s, om) = (s0, om0)
Hpvj:protocol_valid Xj l (s, om)
protocol_prop X
  (vtransition X
     (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
     (lift_to_composite_state IM j s, om))

        
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
l:label
s:state
om:option message
Hfr:vvalid X
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s, om)
_om:option message
Hp1:protocol_prop Xj (s, _om)
_s:state
Hp2:protocol_prop Xj (_s, om)
Hv:valid l (s, om)
IHHp1:protocol_state_prop X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
IHHp2:forall (s : state) (om0 : option message),
(_s, om) = (s, om0) ->
protocol_state_prop X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
s0:state
om0:option message
H0:vtransition (IM j) l (s, om) = (s0, om0)
Hpvj:protocol_valid Xj l (s, om)
_sX:state
HpmX:protocol_prop X (_sX, om)
protocol_prop X
  (vtransition X
     (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
     (lift_to_composite_state IM j s, om))

        
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
l:label
s:state
om:option message
Hfr:vvalid X
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s, om)
_om:option message
Hp1:protocol_prop Xj (s, _om)
_s:state
Hp2:protocol_prop Xj (_s, om)
Hv:valid l (s, om)
_omX:option message
HpsX:protocol_prop X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s, _omX)
IHHp2:forall (s : state) (om0 : option message),
(_s, om) = (s, om0) ->
protocol_state_prop X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
s0:state
om0:option message
H0:vtransition (IM j) l (s, om) = (s0, om0)
Hpvj:protocol_valid Xj l (s, om)
_sX:state
HpmX:protocol_prop X (_sX, om)
protocol_prop X
  (vtransition X
     (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
     (lift_to_composite_state IM j s, om))

        apply
          (protocol_generated X
            (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
            (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
            _omX
            HpsX
            _sX
            om
            HpmX
            Hfr
          ).

_s:state
om:option message

  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)

  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s, om) =
(lift_to_composite_state IM j s0, om0)

message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
Hfr:projection_friendliness_sufficient_condition
l:label
s:state
_om:option message
Hp1:protocol_prop Xj (s, _om)
_s:state
om:option message
Hp2:protocol_prop Xj (_s, om)
Hv:valid l (s, om)
IHHp1:protocol_state_prop X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
IHHp2:forall (s : state) (om0 : option message),
(_s, om) = (s, om0) ->
protocol_state_prop X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
s0:state
om0:option message
H0:vtransition (IM j) l (s, om) = (s0, om0)
(let (si', om') :=
   vtransition (IM j) l
     (lift_to_composite_state IM j s j, om) in
 (state_update IM (lift_to_composite_state IM j s) j
    si', om')) =
(lift_to_composite_state IM j s0, om0)

s:state
_om:option message

_s:state
om:option message
Hp2:protocol_prop Xj (_s, om)
Hv:valid l (s, om)
IHHp1:protocol_state_prop X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
IHHp2:forall (s : state) (om0 : option message),
(_s, om) = (s, om0) ->
protocol_state_prop X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
s0:state
om0:option message
H0:vtransition (IM j) l (s, om) = (s0, om0)
(let (si', om') :=
   vtransition (IM j) l
     (state_update IM (proj1_sig (composite_s0 IM)) j
        s j, om) in
 (state_update IM (lift_to_composite_state IM j s) j
    si', om')) =
(lift_to_composite_state IM j s0, om0)

  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
IHHp2:forall (s : state) (om0 : option message),

message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
Hfr:projection_friendliness_sufficient_condition
l:label
s:state
_om:option message
Hp1:protocol_prop Xj (s, _om)
_s:state
om:option message
Hp2:protocol_prop Xj (_s, om)
Hv:valid l (s, om)
IHHp1:protocol_state_prop X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
IHHp2:forall (s : state) (om0 : option message),
(_s, om) = (s, om0) ->
protocol_state_prop X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
s0:state
om0:option message
H0:vtransition (IM j) l (s, om) = (s0, om0)
state_update IM
  (state_update IM (proj1_sig (composite_s0 IM)) j s)
  j s0 =
state_update IM (proj1_sig (composite_s0 IM)) j s0

        apply state_update_twice.
  Qed.

om:option message
Hv:protocol_valid Xj l (s, om)
vvalid X (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s, om)

message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
l:label
s:state
om:option message
Hfr:vvalid X
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s, om)
_om:option message
Hpsj:protocol_prop Xj (s, _om)
Hpmj:option_protocol_message_prop Xj om
_sx:vstate X
Hs:_sx j = s
_HpsX:protocol_state_prop X _sx
HpmX:option_protocol_message_prop X om
Hv:valid
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
  (_sx, om)
HpsX:protocol_state_prop X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
vvalid X (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s, om)

    assumption.
  Qed.

  
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
Hfr:projection_friendliness_sufficient_condition
l:label
is, os:state
iom, oom:option message
Ht:protocol_transition Xj l (is, iom) (os, oom)
protocol_transition X
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j is, iom)
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j os, oom)

  
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
Hfr:projection_friendliness_sufficient_condition
l:label
is, os:state
iom, oom:option message
Ht:protocol_transition Xj l (is, iom) (os, oom)
protocol_transition X
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j is, iom)
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j os, oom)

    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
Hfr:projection_friendliness_sufficient_condition
l:label
is, os:state
iom, oom, _om:option message
Hps:protocol_prop Xj (is, _om)
_s:state
Hpm:protocol_prop Xj (_s, iom)
Hv:valid l (is, iom)
Ht:transition l (is, iom) = (os, oom)
protocol_transition X
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j is, iom)
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j os, oom)

    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
Hfr:projection_friendliness_sufficient_condition
l:label
is, os:state
iom, oom, _om:option message
Hps:protocol_prop Xj (is, _om)
_s:state
Hpm:protocol_prop Xj (_s, iom)
Hv:valid l (is, iom)
Ht:transition l (is, iom) = (os, oom)
Hpv:protocol_valid Xj l (is, iom)
protocol_transition X
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j is, iom)
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j os, oom)

message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
Hfr:projection_friendliness_sufficient_condition
l:label
is, os:state
iom, oom, _om:option message
Hps:protocol_prop Xj (is, _om)
_s:state
Hpm:protocol_prop Xj (_s, iom)
Hv:valid l (is, iom)
Ht:transition l (is, iom) = (os, oom)
Hpv:protocol_valid Xj l (is, iom)
(let (si', om') :=
   vtransition (IM j) l
     (lift_to_composite_state IM j is j, iom) in
 (state_update IM (lift_to_composite_state IM j is) j
    si', om')) =
(lift_to_composite_state IM j os, oom)
 
message, index:Type

Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
Hfr:projection_friendliness_sufficient_condition
l:label
is, os:state
iom, oom, _om:option message
Hps:protocol_prop Xj (is, _om)
_s:state
Hpm:protocol_prop Xj (_s, iom)
Hv:valid l (is, iom)
Ht:transition l (is, iom) = (os, oom)
Hpv:protocol_valid Xj l (is, iom)
(let (si', om') :=
   vtransition (IM j) l
     (state_update IM (proj1_sig (composite_s0 IM)) j
        is j, iom) in
 (state_update IM (lift_to_composite_state IM j is) j
    si', om')) =
(lift_to_composite_state IM j os, oom)

message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
Hfr:projection_friendliness_sufficient_condition
l:label
is, os:state
iom, oom, _om:option message
Hps:protocol_prop Xj (is, _om)
_s:state
Hpm:protocol_prop Xj (_s, iom)
Hv:valid l (is, iom)
Ht:transition l (is, iom) = (os, oom)
Hpv:protocol_valid Xj l (is, iom)
state_update IM
  (state_update IM (proj1_sig (composite_s0 IM)) j is)
  j os =
state_update IM (proj1_sig (composite_s0 IM)) j os

      apply state_update_twice.
  Qed.

  
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
Hfr:projection_friendliness_sufficient_condition
s:state
ls:list transition_item
Hpxt:finite_protocol_trace_from Xj s ls
finite_protocol_trace_from X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
  (List.map (lift_to_composite_transition_item IM j)
     ls)

message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
Hfr:projection_friendliness_sufficient_condition
s:state
tl:list transition_item
Hpxt:finite_protocol_trace_from Xj s tl
s':state
iom, oom:option message
l:label
H:protocol_transition Xj l (s', iom) (s, oom)
IHHpxt:finite_protocol_trace_from X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
  (List.map
     (lift_to_composite_transition_item IM j)
     tl)
finite_protocol_trace_from X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s')
  (List.map (lift_to_composite_transition_item IM j)
     ({|
      l := l;
      input := iom;
      destination := s;
      output := oom |} :: tl))

  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
  (List.map (lift_to_composite_transition_item IM j)
     [])

message, index:Type

      apply projection_friendliness_sufficient_condition_protocol_state in H; assumption.
    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message

composite_state IM * option message ->

j:index

s:state
tl:list transition_item
Hpxt:finite_protocol_trace_from Xj s tl

l:label
H:protocol_transition Xj l (s', iom) (s, oom)
IHHpxt:finite_protocol_trace_from X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
  (List.map
     (lift_to_composite_transition_item IM j)
     tl)
finite_protocol_trace_from X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s')

     ({|
      l := l;
      input := iom;
      destination := s;
      output := oom |} :: tl))
 
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
Hfr:projection_friendliness_sufficient_condition
s:state
tl:list transition_item
Hpxt:finite_protocol_trace_from Xj s tl
s':state
iom, oom:option message
l:label
H:protocol_transition Xj l (s', iom) (s, oom)
IHHpxt:finite_protocol_trace_from X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
  (List.map
     (lift_to_composite_transition_item IM j)
     tl)
protocol_transition X
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s', iom)
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s, oom)

      apply projection_friendliness_sufficient_condition_protocol_transition; assumption.
  Qed.

  
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
Hfr:projection_friendliness_sufficient_condition
s:state
ls:Stream transition_item
Hpxt:infinite_protocol_trace_from Xj s ls
infinite_protocol_trace_from X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
  (map (lift_to_composite_transition_item IM j) ls)

message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
Hfr:projection_friendliness_sufficient_condition
H:forall (ls : Stream transition_item) (s : state),
infinite_protocol_trace_from Xj s ls ->
infinite_protocol_trace_from X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
  (map (lift_to_composite_transition_item IM j) ls)
l:label
input:option message
destination:state
output:option message
ls:Stream transition_item
s:state
Hx:infinite_protocol_trace_from Xj s
  (Cons
     {|
     l := l;
     input := input;
     destination := destination;
     output := output |} ls)
infinite_protocol_trace_from X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
  (map (lift_to_composite_transition_item IM j)
     (Cons
        {|
        l := l;
        input := input;
        destination := destination;
        output := output |} ls))

    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
Hfr:projection_friendliness_sufficient_condition
H:forall (ls : Stream transition_item) (s : state),
infinite_protocol_trace_from Xj s ls ->
infinite_protocol_trace_from X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
  (map (lift_to_composite_transition_item IM j) ls)
l:label
input:option message
destination:state
output:option message
ls:Stream transition_item
s:state
Hx:infinite_protocol_trace_from Xj s
  (Cons
     {|
     l := l;
     input := input;
     destination := destination;
     output := output |} ls)
H3:infinite_protocol_trace_from Xj destination ls
H7:protocol_transition Xj l 
  (s, input) (destination, output)
infinite_protocol_trace_from X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
  (map (lift_to_composite_transition_item IM j)
     (Cons
        {|
        l := l;
        input := input;
        destination := destination;
        output := output |} ls))

    
message, index:Type

IM:index -> VLSM message

Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
Hfr:projection_friendliness_sufficient_condition
H:forall (ls : Stream transition_item) (s : state),
infinite_protocol_trace_from Xj s ls ->
infinite_protocol_trace_from X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
  (map (lift_to_composite_transition_item IM j) ls)
l:label
input:option message
destination:state
output:option message
ls:Stream transition_item
s:state
Hx:infinite_protocol_trace_from Xj s
  (Cons
     {|
     l := l;
     input := input;
     destination := destination;
     output := output |} ls)
H3:infinite_protocol_trace_from Xj destination ls
H7:protocol_transition Xj l 
  (s, input) (destination, output)
infinite_protocol_trace_from X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
  (Cons
     (lift_to_composite_transition_item IM j
        {|
        l := l;
        input := input;
        destination := destination;
        output := output |})
     (map (lift_to_composite_transition_item IM j) ls))

message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
Hfr:projection_friendliness_sufficient_condition
H:forall (ls : Stream transition_item) (s : state),
infinite_protocol_trace_from Xj s ls ->
infinite_protocol_trace_from X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
  (map (lift_to_composite_transition_item IM j) ls)
l:label
input:option message
destination:state
output:option message
ls:Stream transition_item
s:state
Hx:infinite_protocol_trace_from Xj s
  (Cons
     {|
     l := l;
     input := input;
     destination := destination;
     output := output |} ls)
H3:infinite_protocol_trace_from Xj destination ls
H7:protocol_transition Xj l 
  (s, input) (destination, output)
protocol_transition X
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s, input)
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j destination, output)

message, index:Type

Hfr:projection_friendliness_sufficient_condition
H:forall (ls : Stream transition_item) (s : state),
infinite_protocol_trace_from Xj s ls ->
infinite_protocol_trace_from X
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
  (map (lift_to_composite_transition_item IM j) ls)
l:label
input:option message
destination:state
output:option message
ls:Stream transition_item
s:state
Hx:infinite_protocol_trace_from Xj s
  (Cons
     {|
     l := l;
     input := input;
     destination := destination;
     output := output |} ls)
H3:infinite_protocol_trace_from Xj destination ls
H7:protocol_transition Xj l 
  (s, input) (destination, output)
protocol_transition X
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) j l)
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s, input)
  (lift_to_composite_state IM j destination, output)
 apply projection_friendliness_sufficient_condition_protocol_transition
    ; assumption.
  Qed.
The result below shows that the projection_friendliness_sufficient_condition might be too strong, in the sense that it allows any trace from the projection to be lifted direclty to X
(all other machines stay in their initial state). 
  
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
T:=composite_type IM:VLSM_type message
constraint:composite_label IM ->
composite_state IM * option message ->
Prop
X:=composite_vlsm IM constraint:VLSM message
j:index
Xj:=composite_vlsm_constrained_projection j:VLSM message
Hfr:projection_friendliness_sufficient_condition
t:Trace
Hpt:protocol_trace_prop Xj t
protocol_trace_prop X (lift_to_composite_trace IM j t)

protocol_trace_prop X (lift_to_composite_trace IM j t)

  (lift_to_composite_state IM j s)
  (List.map (lift_to_composite_transition_item IM j)
     ls)

 assumption.

  (map (lift_to_composite_transition_item IM j)
     ss)
Hinit:initial_state_prop s
vinitial_state_prop (IM j) s
 assumption.
  Qed.

  End projection_friendliness_sufficient_condition.

End projections.

Section free_projections.

Projections of free compositions

These projections are simple instances of the projections defined above in which the composition constraint is taken to be True.
All results from regular projections carry to these "free" projections. 
  Context {message : Type}
          {index : Type}
          {IndEqDec : EqDecision index}
          (IM :index -> VLSM message)
          {i0 : Inhabited index}
          (X := free_composite_vlsm IM)
          .

  Definition composite_vlsm_free_projection
    (i : index)
    : VLSM message
    :=
    composite_vlsm_constrained_projection IM (free_constraint IM) i.

  
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
s:vstate X
Hs:protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s
i:index
protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) (s i)

  
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
s:vstate X
Hs:protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s
i:index
protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) (s i)

    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
s:vstate X
Hs:protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s
forall i : index,
protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) (s i)
 
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
forall s : vstate X,
protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s ->
forall i : index,
protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) (s i)

    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
s:state
Hs:initial_state_prop s
i:index
protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) (s i)
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
s':state
l:label
om, om':option message
s:state
Ht:protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) l 
  (s, om) (s', om')
IHHs:forall i : index,
protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  (s i)
i:index
protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) 
  (s' i)

    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
s:state
Hs:initial_state_prop s
i:index
protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) (s i)
 
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
s:state
Hs:initial_state_prop s
i:index
(exists is : initial_state, s i = proj1_sig is) \/
(exists
   (l : label) (som : state * option message) (om' : 
                                               option
                                                 message),
   protocol_transition
     (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) l som
     (s i, om'))
 
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
s:state
Hs:initial_state_prop s
i:index
exists is : initial_state, s i = proj1_sig is
 
message, index:Type

IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
s:state
i:index
Hs:vinitial_state_prop (IM i) (s i)
exists is : initial_state, s i = proj1_sig is
 
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
s:state
i:index
Hs:initial_state_prop (s i)
exists is : initial_state, s i = proj1_sig is

      
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
s:state
i:index
Hs:initial_state_prop (s i)
s i = proj1_sig (exist initial_state_prop (s i) Hs)
 reflexivity.
    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
s':state
l:label
om, om':option message
s:state
Ht:protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) l 
  (s, om) (s', om')
IHHs:forall i : index,
protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  (s i)
i:index
protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) (s' i)
 
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
s':state
l:label
om, om':option message
s:state
Hps:protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s
Hpm:option_protocol_message_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) om
Hv:free_composite_valid IM l (s, om)
Ht:transition l (s, om) = (s', om')
IHHs:forall i : index,
protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  (s i)
i:index
protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) (s' i)

l:label
om, om':option message
s:state
Hps:protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s
Hpm:option_protocol_message_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) om
Hv:let (i, li) := l in vvalid (IM i) li (s i, om)
Ht:transition l (s, om) = (s', om')
IHHs:forall i : index,
protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  (s i)
i:index
protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) (s' i)

message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
s':state
l:label
om, om':option message
s:state
Hps:protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s
Hpm:option_protocol_message_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) om
Hv:let (i, li) := l in vvalid (IM i) li (s i, om)
Ht:(let (i, li) := l in
 let (si', om') :=
   vtransition (IM i) li (s i, om) in
 (state_update IM s i si', om')) = 
(s', om')
IHHs:forall i : index,
protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  (s i)
i:index
protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) (s' i)

      
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
s':state
i':index
li':vlabel (IM i')
om, om':option message
s:state
Hps:protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s
Hpm:option_protocol_message_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) om
Hv:vvalid (IM i') li' (s i', om)
Ht:(let (si', om') :=
   vtransition (IM i') li' (s i', om) in
 (state_update IM s i' si', om')) = 
(s', om')
IHHs:forall i : index,
protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  (s i)
i:index
protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) (s' i)

  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))

H1:omi' = om'

  (state_update IM s i' si' i)

message, index:Type

IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
i:index
li':vlabel (IM i)
m:message
om':option message
s:state
Hps:protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s
Hpm:option_protocol_message_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) 
  (Some m)
si':state
Ht':vtransition (IM i) li' (s i, Some m) =
(si', om')
Hv:vvalid (IM i) li' (s i, Some m)
IHHs:protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  (s i)
Him:vinitial_message_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) m
im:=exist
  (vinitial_message_prop
     (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))) m
  Him:{x : message
| vinitial_message_prop
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) x}
protocol_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  (proj1_sig
     (vs0 (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))),
  Some m)

          apply (protocol_initial_message (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) im).
        
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
i:index
li':vlabel (IM i)
om':option message
s:state
Hps:protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s
Hpm:option_protocol_message_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) None
si':state
Ht':vtransition (IM i) li' (s i, None) = (si', om')
Hv:vvalid (IM i) li' (s i, None)
IHHs:protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  (s i)
protocol_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  (proj1_sig
     (vs0 (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))),
  None)
 apply (protocol_initial_state (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))).
      
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
i':index
li':vlabel (IM i')
om, om':option message
s:state
Hps:protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s
Hpm:option_protocol_message_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) om
Hv:vvalid (IM i') li' (s i', om)
si':state
Ht':vtransition (IM i') li' (s i', om) = (si', om')
IHHs:forall i : index,
protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  (s i)
i:index
n:i <> i'
protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  (state_update IM s i' si' i)
 
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
i':index
li':vlabel (IM i')
om, om':option message
s:state
Hps:protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s
Hpm:option_protocol_message_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) om
Hv:vvalid (IM i') li' (s i', om)
si':state
Ht':vtransition (IM i') li' (s i', om) = (si', om')
IHHs:forall i : index,
protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  (s i)
i:index
n:i <> i'
protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) (s i)
 apply IHHs.
  Qed.

  
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
s1, s2:vstate X
om1, om2:option message
l:label
Ht:protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) l
  (s1, om1) (s2, om2)
i:=projT1 l:index
protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  (projT2 l) (s1 i, om1) (s2 i, om2)

  
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
s1, s2:vstate X
om1, om2:option message
l:label
Ht:protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) l
  (s1, om1) (s2, om2)
i:=projT1 l:index
protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  (projT2 l) (s1 i, om1) (s2 i, om2)

    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
s1, s2:vstate X
om1, om2:option message
l:label
Hs1:protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
Hom1:option_protocol_message_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) om1
Hv:free_composite_valid IM l (s1, om1)
Ht:transition l (s1, om1) = (s2, om2)
i:=projT1 l:index
protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  (projT2 l) (s1 i, om1) (s2 i, om2)

    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
s1, s2:vstate X
om1, om2:option message
l:label
Hs1:protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
Hom1:option_protocol_message_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) om1
Hv:let (i, li) := l in vvalid (IM i) li (s1 i, om1)
Ht:transition l (s1, om1) = (s2, om2)
i:=projT1 l:index
protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  (projT2 l) (s1 i, om1) (s2 i, om2)
 
message, index:Type

i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
s1, s2:vstate X
om1, om2:option message
l:label
Hs1:protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
Hom1:option_protocol_message_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) om1
Hv:let (i, li) := l in vvalid (IM i) li (s1 i, om1)
Ht:vtransition X l (s1, om1) = (s2, om2)
i:=projT1 l:index
protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  (projT2 l) (s1 i, om1) (s2 i, om2)

i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
s1, s2:vstate X
om1, om2:option message
l:label
Hs1:protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
Hom1:option_protocol_message_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) om1
Hv:let (i, li) := l in vvalid (IM i) li (s1 i, om1)
Ht:transition l (s1, om1) = (s2, om2)
i:=projT1 l:index

  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  (projT2 l) (s1 i, om1) (s2 i, om2)
 
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
s1, s2:vstate X
om1, om2:option message
l:label
Hs1:protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
Hom1:option_protocol_message_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) om1
Hv:let (i, li) := l in vvalid (IM i) li (s1 i, om1)
Ht:(let (i, li) := l in
 let (si', om') :=
   vtransition (IM i) li (s1 i, om1) in
 (state_update IM s1 i si', om')) = 
(s2, om2)
i:=projT1 l:index
protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  (projT2 l) (s1 i, om1) (s2 i, om2)

    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
s1, s2:vstate X
om1, om2:option message
il:index
l:vlabel (IM il)
Hs1:protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
Hom1:option_protocol_message_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) om1
Hv:vvalid (IM il) l (s1 il, om1)
Ht:(let (si', om') :=
   vtransition (IM il) l (s1 il, om1) in
 (state_update IM s1 il si', om')) = 
(s2, om2)
i:=projT1
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) il l):index
protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  (projT2
     (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) il l))
  (s1 i, om1) (s2 i, om2)

  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
Hom1:option_protocol_message_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) om1
Hv:vvalid (IM il) l (s1 il, om1)
Ht:(let (si', om') :=
   vtransition (IM il) l (s1 il, om1) in
 (state_update IM s1 il si', om')) = 
(s2, om2)
i:=il:index
protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) l
  (s1 i, om1) (s2 i, om2)

  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) om1
Hv:vvalid (IM il) l (s1 il, om1)
Ht:(let (si', om') :=
   vtransition (IM il) l (s1 il, om1) in
 (state_update IM s1 il si', om')) = 
(s2, om2)

  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM il)) l
  (s1 il, om1) (s2 il, om2)

    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
s1, s2:vstate X
om1, om2:option message
il:index
l:vlabel (IM il)
Hs1:protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
Hom1:option_protocol_message_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) om1
Hv:vvalid (IM il) l (s1 il, om1)
si':state
om':option message
Htj:vtransition (IM il) l (s1 il, om1) = (si', om')
Ht:(state_update IM s1 il si', om') = (s2, om2)
protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM il)) l
  (s1 il, om1) (s2 il, om2)

    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
s1, s2:vstate X
om1, om2:option message
il:index
l:vlabel (IM il)
Hs1:protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
Hom1:option_protocol_message_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) om1
Hv:vvalid (IM il) l (s1 il, om1)
si':state
om':option message
Htj:vtransition (IM il) l (s1 il, om1) = (si', om')
Ht:(state_update IM s1 il si', om') = (s2, om2)
H0:state_update IM s1 il si' = s2
H1:om' = om2
protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM il)) l
  (s1 il, om1) (state_update IM s1 il si' il, om2)

  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) om1
Hv:vvalid (IM il) l (s1 il, om1)
si':state
Htj:vtransition (IM il) l (s1 il, om1) = (si', om2)
protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM il)) l
  (s1 il, om1) (state_update IM s1 il si' il, om2)

message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index

s1:vstate X
m1:message
om2:option message

  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
Hom1:option_protocol_message_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
  (Some m1)
Hv:vvalid (IM il) l (s1 il, Some m1)
si':state
Htj:vtransition (IM il) l (s1 il, Some m1) =
(si', om2)
protocol_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM il))
  (proj1_sig (vs0 (IM il)), Some m1)
message, index:Type

Hs1:protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
Hom1:option_protocol_message_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) None
Hv:vvalid (IM il) l (s1 il, None)
si':state
Htj:vtransition (IM il) l (s1 il, None) = (si', om2)
protocol_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM il))
  (proj1_sig (vs0 (IM il)), None)

message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
s1:vstate X
m1:message
om2:option message
il:index
l:vlabel (IM il)
Hs1:protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
Hom1:option_protocol_message_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
  (Some m1)
Hv:vvalid (IM il) l (s1 il, Some m1)
si':state
Htj:vtransition (IM il) l (s1 il, Some m1) =
(si', om2)
Hm1:vinitial_message_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM il)) m1
protocol_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM il))
  (proj1_sig (vs0 (IM il)), Some m1)

        
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
s1:vstate X
m1:message
om2:option message
il:index
l:vlabel (IM il)
Hs1:protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
Hom1:option_protocol_message_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
  (Some m1)
Hv:vvalid (IM il) l (s1 il, Some m1)
si':state
Htj:vtransition (IM il) l (s1 il, Some m1) =
(si', om2)
Hm1:vinitial_message_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM il)) m1
protocol_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM il))
  (proj1_sig (vs0 (IM il)),
  Some
    (proj1_sig
       (exist
          (vinitial_message_prop
             (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
                (IM il))) m1 Hm1)))

        apply (protocol_initial_message (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM il))).
      
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
s1:vstate X
om2:option message
il:index
l:vlabel (IM il)
Hs1:protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
Hom1:option_protocol_message_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) None
Hv:vvalid (IM il) l (s1 il, None)
si':state
Htj:vtransition (IM il) l (s1 il, None) = (si', om2)
protocol_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM il))
  (proj1_sig (vs0 (IM il)), None)
 apply (protocol_initial_state (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM il))).
  Qed.

  
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
s1, s2:vstate X
om1, om2:option message
l:label
Ht:protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) l
  (s1, om1) (s2, om2)
i:index
Hi:i <> projT1 l
s1 i = s2 i

  
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
s1, s2:vstate X
om1, om2:option message
l:label
Ht:protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) l
  (s1, om1) (s2, om2)
i:index
Hi:i <> projT1 l
s1 i = s2 i

    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
s1, s2:vstate X
om1, om2:option message
l:label
Hs1:protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
Hom1:option_protocol_message_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) om1
Hv:free_composite_valid IM l (s1, om1)
Ht:transition l (s1, om1) = (s2, om2)
i:index
Hi:i <> projT1 l
s1 i = s2 i

    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
s1, s2:vstate X
om1, om2:option message
l:label

  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
Hom1:option_protocol_message_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) om1
Hv:let (i, li) := l in vvalid (IM i) li (s1 i, om1)
Ht:transition l (s1, om1) = (s2, om2)
i:index
Hi:i <> projT1 l
s1 i = s2 i

  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1

message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
s1, s2:vstate X
om1, om2:option message
l:label
Hs1:protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
Hom1:option_protocol_message_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) om1
Hv:let (i, li) := l in vvalid (IM i) li (s1 i, om1)
Ht:(let (i, li) := l in
 let (si', om') :=
   vtransition (IM i) li (s1 i, om1) in
 (state_update IM s1 i si', om')) = 
(s2, om2)
i:index
Hi:i <> projT1 l
s1 i = s2 i

    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
s1, s2:vstate X
om1, om2:option message
il:index
l:vlabel (IM il)
Hs1:protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
Hom1:option_protocol_message_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) om1
Hv:vvalid (IM il) l (s1 il, om1)
Ht:(let (si', om') :=
   vtransition (IM il) l (s1 il, om1) in
 (state_update IM s1 il si', om')) = 
(s2, om2)
i:index
Hi:i <>
projT1
  (existT (fun n : index => vlabel (IM n)) il l)
s1 i = s2 i
 
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
s1, s2:vstate X
om1, om2:option message
il:index
l:vlabel (IM il)
Hs1:protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
Hom1:option_protocol_message_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) om1
Hv:vvalid (IM il) l (s1 il, om1)
Ht:(let (si', om') :=
   vtransition (IM il) l (s1 il, om1) in
 (state_update IM s1 il si', om')) = 
(s2, om2)
i:index
Hi:i <> il
s1 i = s2 i

    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
s1, s2:vstate X
om1, om2:option message
il:index
l:vlabel (IM il)
Hs1:protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
Hom1:option_protocol_message_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) om1
Hv:vvalid (IM il) l (s1 il, om1)
si':state
om':option message
Htj:vtransition (IM il) l (s1 il, om1) = (si', om')
Ht:(state_update IM s1 il si', om') = (s2, om2)
i:index
Hi:i <> il
s1 i = s2 i

    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
s1, s2:vstate X
om1, om2:option message
il:index
l:vlabel (IM il)
Hs1:protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
Hom1:option_protocol_message_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) om1
Hv:vvalid (IM il) l (s1 il, om1)
si':state
om':option message
Htj:vtransition (IM il) l (s1 il, om1) = (si', om')
Ht:(state_update IM s1 il si', om') = (s2, om2)
i:index
Hi:i <> il
H0:state_update IM s1 il si' = s2
H1:om' = om2
s1 i = state_update IM s1 il si' i
 
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
s1:vstate X
om1, om2:option message
il:index
l:vlabel (IM il)
Hs1:protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
Hom1:option_protocol_message_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) om1
Hv:vvalid (IM il) l (s1 il, om1)
si':state
Htj:vtransition (IM il) l (s1 il, om1) = (si', om2)
i:index
Hi:i <> il
s1 i = state_update IM s1 il si' i

    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
s1:vstate X
om1, om2:option message
il:index
l:vlabel (IM il)
Hs1:protocol_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
Hom1:option_protocol_message_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) om1
Hv:vvalid (IM il) l (s1 il, om1)
si':state
Htj:vtransition (IM il) l (s1 il, om1) = (si', om2)
i:index
Hi:i <> il
s1 i = s1 i

    reflexivity.
  Qed.

  
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
s1, s2:vstate X
Hfutures:in_futures
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
  s2
i:index
in_futures (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  (s1 i) (s2 i)

  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
  s2

message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
s1, s2:vstate X
tr:list transition_item
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1 tr
Hlast:last (List.map destination tr) s1 = s2
i:index
in_futures (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  (s1 i) (s2 i)

    
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
s2:vstate X
tr:list transition_item
i:index
forall s1 : vstate X,
finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1 tr ->
last (List.map destination tr) s1 = s2 ->
in_futures (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  (s1 i) (s2 i)

  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1 []
Hlast:last (List.map destination []) s1 = s2
in_futures (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  (s1 i) (s2 i)
message, index:Type

finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1 tr ->
last (List.map destination tr) s1 = s2 ->

  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  (s1 i) (s2 i)

  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
  (a :: tr)
Hlast:last (List.map destination (a :: tr)) s1 = s2

  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) (s1 i) [] /\
last (List.map destination []) (s1 i) = s2 i

message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index

s2:vstate X

tr:list transition_item

  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1 tr ->

  (s1 i) (s2 i)

  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
  (a :: tr)

  (destination a :: List.map destination tr)
  s1 = s2

  (s1 i) (s2 i)

  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1 tr ->

  (s1 i) (s2 i)

  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
  (a :: tr)
