message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
s2:vstate X
a:transition_item
tr:list transition_item
i:index
IHtr:forall s1 : vstate X,
finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1 tr ->
last (List.map destination tr) s1 = s2 ->
in_futures
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  (s1 i) (s2 i)
s1:vstate X
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
  (a :: tr)
Hlast:last (List.map destination tr) (destination a) =
s2
s:state
tl:list transition_item
s':state
iom, oom:option message
l:label
H2:finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s tr
H3:protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) l
  (s1, iom) (s, oom)
H1:s' = s1
H:{|
l := l;
input := iom;
destination := s;
output := oom |} = a
H0:tl = tr
in_futures (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  (s1 i) (s2 i)
 
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
tr:list transition_item
i:index
s:state
iom, oom:option message
l:label
IHtr:forall s1 : vstate X,
finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1 tr ->
last (List.map destination tr) s1 =
last (List.map destination tr)
  (destination
     {|
     l := l;
     input := iom;
     destination := s;
     output := oom |}) ->
in_futures
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  (s1 i)
  (last (List.map destination tr)
     (destination
        {|
        l := l;
        input := iom;
        destination := s;
        output := oom |}) i)
s1:vstate X
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
  ({|
   l := l;
   input := iom;
   destination := s;
   output := oom |} :: tr)
H2:finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s tr
H3:protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) l
  (s1, iom) (s, oom)
in_futures (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  (s1 i)
  (last (List.map destination tr)
     (destination
        {|
        l := l;
        input := iom;
        destination := s;
        output := oom |}) i)
 
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
tr:list transition_item
i:index
s:_composite_state IM
iom, oom:option message
l:_composite_label IM
IHtr:forall s1 : vstate X,
finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1 tr ->
last (List.map destination tr) s1 =
last (List.map destination tr) s ->
in_futures
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  (s1 i) (last (List.map destination tr) s i)
s1:vstate X
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
  ({|
   l := l;
   input := iom;
   destination := s;
   output := oom |} :: tr)
H2:finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s tr
H3:protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) l
  (s1, iom) (s, oom)
in_futures (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  (s1 i) (last (List.map destination tr) s i)

      
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
tr:list transition_item
i:index
s:_composite_state IM
iom, oom:option message
l:_composite_label IM
IHtr:in_futures
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  (s i) (last (List.map destination tr) s i)
s1:vstate X
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
  ({|
   l := l;
   input := iom;
   destination := s;
   output := oom |} :: tr)
H2:finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s tr
H3:protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) l
  (s1, iom) (s, oom)
in_futures (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  (s1 i) (last (List.map destination tr) s i)

      
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
tr:list transition_item
i:index
s:_composite_state IM
iom, oom:option message
l:_composite_label IM
IHtr:in_futures
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  (s i) (last (List.map destination tr) s i)
s1:vstate X
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
  ({|
   l := l;
   input := iom;
   destination := s;
   output := oom |} :: tr)
H2:finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s tr
H3:protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) l
  (s1, iom) (s, oom)
e:i = projT1 l
in_futures (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  (s1 i) (last (List.map destination tr) s i)
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
tr:list transition_item
i:index
s:_composite_state IM
iom, oom:option message
l:_composite_label IM
IHtr:in_futures
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  (s i) (last (List.map destination tr) s i)
s1:vstate X
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
  ({|
   l := l;
   input := iom;
   destination := s;
   output := oom |} :: tr)
H2:finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s tr
H3:protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) l
  (s1, iom) (s, oom)
n:i <> projT1 l
in_futures (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  (s1 i) (last (List.map destination tr) s i)

      
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
tr:list transition_item
i:index
s:_composite_state IM
iom, oom:option message
l:_composite_label IM
IHtr:in_futures
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  (s i) (last (List.map destination tr) s i)
s1:vstate X
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
  ({|
   l := l;
   input := iom;
   destination := s;
   output := oom |} :: tr)
H2:finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s tr
H3:protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) l
  (s1, iom) (s, oom)
e:i = projT1 l
in_futures (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  (s1 i) (last (List.map destination tr) s i)
 
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
tr:list transition_item
s:_composite_state IM
iom, oom:option message
l:_composite_label IM
IHtr:in_futures
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
     (IM (projT1 l))) (s (projT1 l))
  (last (List.map destination tr) s (projT1 l))
s1:vstate X
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
  ({|
   l := l;
   input := iom;
   destination := s;
   output := oom |} :: tr)
H2:finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s tr
H3:protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) l
  (s1, iom) (s, oom)
in_futures
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM (projT1 l)))
  (s1 (projT1 l))
  (last (List.map destination tr) s (projT1 l))
 
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
tr:list transition_item
s:_composite_state IM
iom, oom:option message
l:_composite_label IM
IHtr:in_futures
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
     (IM (projT1 l))) (s (projT1 l))
  (last (List.map destination tr) s (projT1 l))
s1:vstate X
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
  ({|
   l := l;
   input := iom;
   destination := s;
   output := oom |} :: tr)
H2:finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s tr
H3:protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
     (IM (projT1 l))) (projT2 l)
  (s1 (projT1 l), iom) 
  (s (projT1 l), oom)
in_futures
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM (projT1 l)))
  (s1 (projT1 l))
  (last (List.map destination tr) s (projT1 l))

        
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
tr:list transition_item
s:_composite_state IM
iom, oom:option message
l:_composite_label IM
tri:list transition_item
Htri:finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
     (IM (projT1 l))) (s (projT1 l)) tri
Hlasti:last (List.map destination tri)
  (s (projT1 l)) =
last (List.map destination tr) s (projT1 l)
s1:vstate X
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
  ({|
   l := l;
   input := iom;
   destination := s;
   output := oom |} :: tr)
H2:finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s tr
H3:protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
     (IM (projT1 l))) (projT2 l)
  (s1 (projT1 l), iom) 
  (s (projT1 l), oom)

  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM (projT1 l)))
  (s1 (projT1 l))
  (last (List.map destination tr) s (projT1 l))

        
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
tr:list transition_item
s:_composite_state IM
iom, oom:option message
l:_composite_label IM
tri:list transition_item
Htri:finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
     (IM (projT1 l))) (s (projT1 l)) tri
Hlasti:last (List.map destination tri)
  (s (projT1 l)) =
last (List.map destination tr) s (projT1 l)
s1:vstate X
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
  ({|
   l := l;
   input := iom;
   destination := s;
   output := oom |} :: tr)
H2:finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s tr
H3:protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
     (IM (projT1 l))) (projT2 l)
  (s1 (projT1 l), iom) 
  (s (projT1 l), oom)
finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM (projT1 l)))
  (s1 (projT1 l))
  ({|
   l := projT2 l;
   input := iom;
   destination := s (projT1 l);
   output := oom |} :: tri) /\
last
  (List.map destination
     ({|
      l := projT2 l;
      input := iom;
      destination := s (projT1 l);
      output := oom |} :: tri)) (s1 (projT1 l)) =
last (List.map destination tr) s (projT1 l)

        
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
tr:list transition_item
s:_composite_state IM
iom, oom:option message
l:_composite_label IM
tri:list transition_item
Htri:finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
     (IM (projT1 l))) (s (projT1 l)) tri
Hlasti:last (List.map destination tri)
  (s (projT1 l)) =
last (List.map destination tr) s (projT1 l)
s1:vstate X
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
  ({|
   l := l;
   input := iom;
   destination := s;
   output := oom |} :: tr)
H2:finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s tr
H3:protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
     (IM (projT1 l))) (projT2 l)
  (s1 (projT1 l), iom) 
  (s (projT1 l), oom)
last
  (List.map destination
     ({|
      l := projT2 l;
      input := iom;
      destination := s (projT1 l);
      output := oom |} :: tri)) (s1 (projT1 l)) =
last (List.map destination tr) s (projT1 l)

        
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
tr:list transition_item
s:_composite_state IM
iom, oom:option message
l:_composite_label IM
tri:list transition_item
Htri:finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
     (IM (projT1 l))) (s (projT1 l)) tri
Hlasti:last (List.map destination tri)
  (s (projT1 l)) =
last (List.map destination tr) s (projT1 l)
s1:vstate X
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
  ({|
   l := l;
   input := iom;
   destination := s;
   output := oom |} :: tr)
H2:finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s tr
H3:protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
     (IM (projT1 l))) (projT2 l)
  (s1 (projT1 l), iom) 
  (s (projT1 l), oom)
last
  (destination
     {|
     l := projT2 l;
     input := iom;
     destination := s (projT1 l);
     output := oom |} :: List.map destination tri)
  (s1 (projT1 l)) =
last (List.map destination tr) s (projT1 l)
 
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
tr:list transition_item
s:_composite_state IM
iom, oom:option message
l:_composite_label IM
tri:list transition_item
Htri:finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
     (IM (projT1 l))) (s (projT1 l)) tri
Hlasti:last (List.map destination tri)
  (s (projT1 l)) =
last (List.map destination tr) s (projT1 l)
s1:vstate X
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
  ({|
   l := l;
   input := iom;
   destination := s;
   output := oom |} :: tr)
H2:finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s tr
H3:protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
     (IM (projT1 l))) (projT2 l)
  (s1 (projT1 l), iom) 
  (s (projT1 l), oom)
last (List.map destination tri)
  (destination
     {|
     l := projT2 l;
     input := iom;
     destination := s (projT1 l);
     output := oom |}) =
last (List.map destination tr) s (projT1 l)
 
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
tr:list transition_item
s:_composite_state IM
iom, oom:option message
l:_composite_label IM
tri:list transition_item
Htri:finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
     (IM (projT1 l))) (s (projT1 l)) tri
Hlasti:last (List.map destination tri)
  (s (projT1 l)) =
last (List.map destination tr) s (projT1 l)
s1:vstate X
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
  ({|
   l := l;
   input := iom;
   destination := s;
   output := oom |} :: tr)
H2:finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s tr
H3:protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
     (IM (projT1 l))) (projT2 l)
  (s1 (projT1 l), iom) 
  (s (projT1 l), oom)
last (List.map destination tri) (s (projT1 l)) =
last (List.map destination tr) s (projT1 l)

        assumption.
      
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
tr:list transition_item
i:index
s:_composite_state IM
iom, oom:option message
l:_composite_label IM
IHtr:in_futures
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  (s i) (last (List.map destination tr) s i)
s1:vstate X
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
  ({|
   l := l;
   input := iom;
   destination := s;
   output := oom |} :: tr)
H2:finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s tr
H3:protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) l
  (s1, iom) (s, oom)
n:i <> projT1 l
in_futures (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  (s1 i) (last (List.map destination tr) s i)
 
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
tr:list transition_item
i:index
s:_composite_state IM
iom, oom:option message
l:_composite_label IM
IHtr:in_futures
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  (s i) (last (List.map destination tr) s i)
s1:vstate X
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
  ({|
   l := l;
   input := iom;
   destination := s;
   output := oom |} :: tr)
H2:finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s tr
H3:protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) l
  (s1, iom) (s, oom)
n:i <> projT1 l
Hs1i:s1 i = s i
in_futures (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  (s1 i) (last (List.map destination tr) s i)

        
message, index:Type
IndEqDec:EqDecision index
IM:index -> VLSM message
i0:Inhabited index
X:=free_composite_vlsm IM:VLSM message
tr:list transition_item
i:index
s:_composite_state IM
iom, oom:option message
l:_composite_label IM
IHtr:in_futures
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  (s i) (last (List.map destination tr) s i)
s1:vstate X
Htr:finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s1
  ({|
   l := l;
   input := iom;
   destination := s;
   output := oom |} :: tr)
H2:finite_protocol_trace_from
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s tr
H3:protocol_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) l
  (s1, iom) (s, oom)
n:i <> projT1 l
Hs1i:s1 i = s i
in_futures (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
  (s i) (last (List.map destination tr) s i)
 assumption.
  Qed.


End free_projections.

Section binary_free_composition.

Free composition of two VLSMs

This serves an example of how composition can be built, but is also being used in definiting the byzantine_trace_properties.
This instantiates the regular composition using the bool type as an index. 
  Context
    {message : Type}
    (M1 M2 : VLSM message)
    .

  Definition binary_index : Set := bool.

  Definition first : binary_index := true.
  Definition second : binary_index := false.

  Instance binary_index_dec :  EqDecision binary_index := _.
  Instance binary_index_inhabited : Inhabited binary_index
    :=
    populate first.

  Definition binary_IM
    (i : binary_index)
    : VLSM message
    :=
    match i with
    | true => M1
    | false => M2
    end.

  Definition binary_free_composition
    : VLSM message
    := free_composite_vlsm binary_IM.

  Definition binary_free_composition_fst
    := composite_vlsm_free_projection binary_IM first.

  Definition binary_free_composition_snd
    := composite_vlsm_free_projection binary_IM second.

End binary_free_composition.
